Spell.mythic_text: The armor bonus increases to +6. There is a 50% chance that any critical hit or sneak attack made against the target is negated and treated as a normal hit, as if the target were wearing moderate fortification armor.

Spell.name: Mage Hand
Spell.spell_level: bard 0, sorcerer/wizard 0, summoner/unchained summoner 0, magus 0, occultist 0, psychic 0, mesmerist 0, spiritualist 0, medium 0
Spell.short_description: 5-pound telekinesis.

Spell.name: Mage's Disjunction
Spell.area: all magical effects and magic items within a 40-ft.-radius burst, or one magic item (see text)
Spell.short_description: Dispels magic, disenchants magic items.
Spell.mythic_text: The duration increases to 10 minutes per caster level. The chance to destroy an antimagic field increases to 2% per caster level.

Spell.name: Mage's Faithful Hound
Spell.duration: 1 hour/caster level or until discharged, then 1 round/caster level; see text
Spell.short_description: Phantom dog can guard a location and attack intruders.

Spell.name: Mage's Lucubration
Spell.short_description: Wizard only. Recalls spell of 5th level or lower.

Spell.name: Mage's Magnificent Mansion
Spell.short_description: Door leads to extradimensional mansion.

Spell.name: Mage's Private Sanctum
Spell.short_description: Prevents anyone from viewing or scrying an area for 24 hours.

Spell.name: Mage's Sword
Spell.short_description: Floating magic blade strikes opponents.

Spell.name: Magic Aura
Spell.short_description: Alters object’s magic aura.

Spell.name: Magic Circle against Evil
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, paladin 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, inquisitor 3, shaman 3, occultist 3, spiritualist 3, medium 3
Spell.short_description: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

Spell.name: Magic Circle against Chaos
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, paladin 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, inquisitor 3, shaman 3, occultist 3, spiritualist 3, medium 3
Spell.short_description: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

Spell.name: Magic Circle against Good
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, inquisitor 3, antipaladin 3, shaman 3, occultist 3, spiritualist 3, medium 3
Spell.short_description: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

Spell.name: Magic Circle against Law
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, inquisitor 3, antipaladin 3, shaman 3, occultist 3, spiritualist 3, medium 3
Spell.short_description: As protection spells, but 10-ft. radius and 10 min./level.

Spell.name: Magic Fang
Spell.short_description: One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1 on attack and damage rolls.
Spell.mythic_text: The spell affects an additional number of the target's natural weapons equal to your tier. For example, if you're 3rd tier, it could affect two claws and one bite).

Spell.name: Magic Fang, Greater
Spell.short_description: One natural weapon gets + 1/four levels (max +5).

Spell.name: Magic Jar
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 5, alchemist 5, summoner 4, witch 5, unchained summoner 5
Spell.duration: 1 hour/level or until you return to your body
Spell.short_description: Enables possession of another creature.

Spell.name: Magic Missile
Spell.short_description: 1d4+1 damage; +1 missile per two levels above 1st (max 5).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt by each missile increases to 2d4+1. The missiles bypass the shield spell and similar effects that block the non-mythic version of this spell.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (4th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell creates double the normal number of missiles (affecting up to 10 creatures), its range increases to line of sight, and it bypasses the targets' spell resistance and spell immunity.

Spell.name: Magic Mouth
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner/unchained summoner 1, occultist 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 1, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Objects speaks once when triggered.

Spell.name: Magic Stone
Spell.short_description: Three stones gain +1 on attack, deal 1d6 +1 damage.

Spell.name: Magic Vestment
Spell.short_description: Armor or shield gains +1 enhancement per four levels.
Spell.mythic_text: You can add one armor special ability to the target if it's armor or one shield special ability if it's a shield. The special ability must have a base price modifier no greater than a +1 enhancement bonus or 4,000 gp.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you can add any number of special abilities with a total base price modifier no greater than a +2 enhancement bonus or 15,000 gp.

Spell.name: Magic Weapon
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, paladin 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, inquisitor 1, antipaladin 1, magus 1, bloodrager 1, shaman 1, occultist 1
Spell.short_description: Weapon gains +1 bonus.

Spell.name: Magic Weapon, Greater
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 4, paladin 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, inquisitor 3, antipaladin 3, magus 3, bloodrager 3, shaman 4, occultist 3
Spell.short_description: Weapon gains +1 bonus/four levels (max +5).
Spell.mythic_text: You can add one of the following weapon special abilities to the weapon: flaming, frost, keen, merciful, shock, or thundering.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (5th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you can reduce the granted enhancement bonus by 1 to add two of the above abilities or one of the following abilities: anarchic, axiomatic, flaming burst, holy, icy burst, shocking burst, or unholy.

Spell.name: Minor Creation
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner/unchained summoner 3, witch 4, occultist 3, psychic 4, spiritualist 3
Spell.short_description: Creates one cloth or wood object.

Spell.name: Major Creation
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner/unchained summoner 4, witch 5, occultist 4, psychic 5
Spell.short_description: As minor creation, plus stone and metal.

Spell.name: Major Image
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, magus 3, occultist 3, psychic 3, mesmerist 3, medium 3
Spell.short_description: As silent image, plus sound, smell, and thermal effects.

Spell.name: Make Whole
Spell.short_description: Repairs an object.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage the spell repairs increases to 2d6 points of damage per caster level when cast on a construct creature (maximum 10d6). A construct repaired with this spell gains a +2 enhancement bonus on an ability score of your choice for the next 24 hours. To repair a magic item, your caster level has to equal to only the caster level of the magic item, not double the caster level.

Spell.name: Mark of Justice
Spell.short_description: Designates action that triggers curse on subject.

Spell.name: Maze
Spell.short_description: Traps subject in extradimensional maze.
Spell.mythic_text: A spectral minotaur hunts the target trapped in the maze. Every round the creature fails to escape from the maze, it takes 2d8 + your tier points of piercing and slashing damage from this phantom opponent.

Spell.name: Meld into Stone
Spell.short_description: You and your gear merge with stone.

Spell.name: Mending
Spell.spell_level: bard 0, cleric/oracle 0, druid 0, sorcerer/wizard 0, summoner/unchained summoner 0, witch 0, shaman 0, occultist 0, psychic 0, spiritualist 0
Spell.short_description: Makes minor repairs on an object.

Spell.name: Message
Spell.spell_level: bard 0, sorcerer/wizard 0, summoner/unchained summoner 0, witch 0, occultist 0, psychic 0, mesmerist 0, spiritualist 0, medium 0
Spell.short_description: Whisper conversation at distance.

Spell.name: Meteor Swarm
Spell.short_description: Four exploding spheres each deal 6d6 fire damage.
Spell.mythic_text: The meteors created by this spell deal bludgeoning damage in a line extending from you to the target destination where it explodes. Creatures in the path of a meteor take 2d10 points of bludgeoning damage and must succeed at a Fortitude save or be knocked prone. The damage from the exploding meteors increases to 6d10 points of fire damage. Creatures that fail their Reflex saves against the fire damage are also knocked prone and deafened for 1d4 rounds.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (10th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, creatures in the path of a meteor also take 4d10 points of fire damage and the damage from the exploding meteors increases to 10d10 points of fire damage; this fire damage bypasses fire resistance and fire immunity.

Spell.name: Mind Blank
Spell.domain: Liberation (8), Protection (8), Thought (8), Espionage (9), Vermin (9), Flowing (8)
Spell.short_description: Subject is protected from mental/emotional magic and scrying.

Spell.name: Mind Fog
Spell.spell_level: bard 5, sorcerer/wizard 5, witch 5, occultist 5, psychic 5, mesmerist 5, spiritualist 5
Spell.short_description: Subjects in fog get –10 to Wis and Will checks.

Spell.name: Minor Image
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, magus 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: As silent image, plus some sound.

Spell.name: Miracle
Spell.short_description: Requests a deity's intercession.

Spell.name: Mirage Arcana
Spell.short_description: As hallucinatory terrain, plus structures.

Spell.name: Mirror Image
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, magus 2, bloodrager 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Creates decoy duplicates of you (1d4 + 1 per three levels, max 8).
Spell.mythic_text: The maximum number of images generated by this spell increases to 12. Destroying an image creates a flash of light. Any creature that destroys an image must succeed at a Will save or be dazzled for 1 round.

Spell.name: Misdirection
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, spiritualist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Misleads divinations for one creature or object.

Spell.name: Mislead
Spell.spell_level: bard 5, sorcerer/wizard 6, alchemist 6, magus 6, occultist 5, psychic 6, mesmerist 5, spiritualist 6
Spell.duration: 1 round/level (D) and concentration + 3 rounds; see text
Spell.short_description: Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.

Spell.name: Mnemonic Enhancer
Spell.short_description: Wizard only. Prepare extra spells or retain one just cast.

Spell.name: Modify Memory
Spell.short_description: Changes 5 minutes of subject's memories.

Spell.name: Moment of Prescience
Spell.short_description: You gain +1/level insight bonus on single attack roll, check, or save.

Spell.name: Mount
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, witch 1, magus 1, bloodrager 1, occultist 1
Spell.short_description: Summons riding horse for 2 hours/level.

Spell.name: Move Earth
Spell.area: dirt in an area up to 750 ft. square and up to 10 ft. deep (S)
Spell.short_description: Digs trenches and builds hills.
Spell.mythic_text: This spell can move earth much more quickly, with each full round of casting allowing you to reshape a 25-foot-square area up to 10 feet deep. All creatures on or under the ground within that area are knocked prone and moved to the closest square outside the area being shaped. A successful Reflex save prevents a creature from being knocked prone, but it's still moved.

Spell.name: Neutralize Poison
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, cleric/oracle 4, druid 3, paladin 4, ranger 3, alchemist 4, witch 4, inquisitor 4, shaman 4, spiritualist 4
Spell.short_description: Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

Spell.name: Nightmare
Spell.spell_level: bard 5, sorcerer/wizard 5, alchemist 5, psychic 5, mesmerist 5, spiritualist 5, medium 4
Spell.short_description: Sends vision dealing 1d10 damage, fatigue.
Spell.mythic_text: The spell's damage increases to 4d6 points of damage, and the target is also shaken for 24 hours.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): You can deliver a mind-affecting spell through a mythic nightmare. The maximum level of the delivered spell is equal to half your tier, and you must expend one use of mythic power for each spell level of the imbued spell in addition to the one use needed to cast mythic nightmare. You choose whether the delivered spell affects the creature immediately or when it awakens. The delivered spell affects only the target, even if it normally affects multiple creatures or an area.

Spell.name: Nondetection
Spell.spell_level: ranger 4, sorcerer/wizard 3, alchemist 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, inquisitor 3, antipaladin 3, occultist 3, psychic 3, mesmerist 3, spiritualist 3, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Hides subject from divination, scrying.

Spell.name: Obscure Object
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, cleric/oracle 3, sorcerer/wizard 2, inquisitor 3, occultist 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 1, spiritualist 3
Spell.short_description: Masks object against scrying.

Spell.name: Obscuring Mist
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, druid 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, magus 1, shaman 1, mesmerist 1, spiritualist 1, unchained summoner 1
Spell.short_description: Fog surrounds you.

Spell.name: Open/Close
Spell.spell_level: bard 0, sorcerer/wizard 0, summoner/unchained summoner 0, magus 0, occultist 0, psychic 0, mesmerist 0, spiritualist 0, medium 0
Spell.short_description: Opens or closes small or light things.

Spell.name: Order's Wrath
Spell.area: nonlawful creatures within a burst that fills a 30-ft. cube
Spell.short_description: Harms and dazes chaotic creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt to chaotic outsiders increases to 1d10 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d10) and the damage to other chaotic creatures increases to 1d12 points of damage per 2 caster levels (maximum 5d12). The duration that creatures in the area are dazed increases to 2 rounds. Chaotic creatures that succeed at their saves are dazed for 1 round.

Spell.name: Overland Flight
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 5, alchemist 5, summoner 4, witch 5, magus 5, shaman 5, occultist 5, psychic 5, spiritualist 5, unchained summoner 5
Spell.short_description: You fly at a speed of 40 ft. and can hustle over long distances.

Spell.name: Owl's Wisdom
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, paladin 2, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, alchemist 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2, shaman 2, psychic 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Subject gains +4 to Wis for 1 min./level.

Spell.name: Owl's Wisdom, Mass
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 6, druid 6, sorcerer/wizard 6, summoner 4, shaman 6, psychic 6, unchained summoner 6
Spell.short_description: As owl’s wisdom, affects 1 subject/level.

Spell.name: Passwall
Spell.short_description: Creates passage through wood or stone wall.

Spell.name: Pass without Trace
Spell.short_description: One subject/level leaves no tracks.

Spell.name: Permanency
Spell.short_description: Makes certain spells permanent.

Spell.name: Permanent Image
Spell.short_description: Permanent illusion, includes sight, sound, smell, and thermal effects.

Spell.name: Persistent Image
Spell.spell_level: bard 5, sorcerer/wizard 5, occultist 5, psychic 5, mesmerist 5, medium 4
Spell.short_description: As major image, but no concentration required.

Spell.name: Phantasmal Killer
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 4, witch 4, magus 4, bloodrager 4, psychic 4, mesmerist 4, spiritualist 4, medium 3
Spell.short_description: Fearsome illusion kills subject or deals 3d6 damage.
Spell.mythic_text: If the target fails its Will save but succeeds at its Fortitude save, the phantasmal killer persists in the target's mind, giving it the dazed condition until your next turn. On your next turn, the target must attempt another Fortitude save against the phantasm. Success means it takes 3d6 points of damage; failure means it dies from fear.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell can affect a living target that is immune to fear, illusions, or mind-affecting effects.

Spell.name: Phantom Steed
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner/unchained summoner 2, magus 3, bloodrager 3, occultist 3, spiritualist 2
Spell.short_description: Magic horse appears for 1 hour/level.
Spell.mythic_text: The steed's rider automatically succeeds at Ride checks to remain mounted. The mount's hit points increase to 10 plus 2 per caster level, and its speed increases to 30 feet per 2 caster levels (maximum 150 feet).
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the phantom steed is incorporeal, but its rider can interact with it normally.

Spell.name: Phantom Trap
Spell.short_description: Makes item seem trapped.

Spell.name: Phase Door
Spell.short_description: Creates an invisible passage through a barrier.

Spell.name: Planar Ally, Lesser
Spell.short_description: Exchange services with a 6 HD extraplanar creature.

Spell.name: Planar Ally
Spell.descriptor: see text for lesser planar ally
Spell.short_description: As lesser planar ally, but up to 12 HD.

Spell.name: Planar Ally, Greater
Spell.descriptor: see text for lesser planar ally
Spell.short_description: As lesser planar ally, but up to 18 HD.

Spell.name: Planar Binding, Lesser
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner 4, occultist 5, psychic 5, unchained summoner 5, medium 4
Spell.short_description: Traps extraplanar creature of 6 HD or less until it performs a task.

Spell.name: Planar Binding
Spell.descriptor: see text for lesser planar binding
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 6, summoner 5, occultist 6, psychic 6, unchained summoner 6
Spell.domain: Daemon (6), Demon (6), Devil (6), Inevitable (6), Protean (6), Aeon (6), Void (6)
Spell.short_description: As lesser planar binding, but up to 12 HD.

Spell.name: Planar Binding, Greater
Spell.descriptor: see text for lesser planar binding
Spell.short_description: As lesser planar binding, but up to 18 HD.

Spell.name: Plane Shift
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 5, sorcerer/wizard 7, summoner 5, witch 7, shaman 7, psychic 5, spiritualist 5, unchained summoner 6, medium 4
Spell.short_description: As many as 8 subjects travel to another plane.
Spell.mythic_text: If you've been to the destination plane and are familiar with a location there, you may choose that location and arrive on target at that location with anyone else you transport with the spell.
Spell.augmented: Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, you grant transported creatures the effects of a planar adaptation spell (Advanced Player's Guide 236) upon arrival, lasting for 1 hour.

Spell.name: Plant Growth
Spell.short_description: Grows vegetation, improves crops.

Spell.name: Plant Shape I
Spell.short_description: Turns you into a Small or Medium plant.

Spell.name: Plant Shape II
Spell.short_description: Turns you into a Large plant creature.

Spell.name: Plant Shape III
Spell.short_description: Turns you into a Huge plant.

Spell.name: Poison
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 4, druid 3, witch 4, antipaladin 4, shaman 4, occultist 4, mesmerist 4
Spell.short_description: Touch deals 1d3 Con damage 1/round for 6 rounds.

Spell.name: Polar Ray
Spell.short_description: Ranged touch attack deals 1d6/level cold damage and 1d4 points of Dexterity drain.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 1d8 points of cold damage per caster level (maximum 25d8) and 1d6 points of Dexterity drain. If the target takes damage from this spell, it becomes partially encased in ice, reducing its speed by half. Creatures with the cold or incorporeal subtypes or immunity to being grappled are immune to this effect. The reduced movement lasts until the ice is destroyed. Destroying the ice requires a successful Strength or dispel check against the spell's DC or dealing 1 point of bludgeoning or fire damage per caster level to the target.

Spell.name: Polymorph
Spell.short_description: Gives one willing subject a new form.

Spell.name: Polymorph, Greater
Spell.short_description: Gives one willing subject a new, more powerful form.

Spell.name: Polymorph Any Object
Spell.short_description: Changes a subject into anything else.

Spell.name: Power Word Blind
Spell.short_description: Blinds creature with 200 hp or less.

Spell.name: Power Word Kill
Spell.short_description: Kills one creature with 100 hp or less.
Spell.mythic_text: Treat the target's current hit point total as though it were lowered by 5 times your tier. For example, a 3rd-tier archmage casting mythic power word kill would instantly kill a creature with 85 hit points or fewer. You can target a creature with more hit points than this spell could normally affect, causing it to become exhausted.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend four uses of mythic power, the magic of the word lingers around the target. Until the beginning of your next turn, if the target's hit point total drops to the point that this spell would have killed it upon casting, it's instantly slain.

Spell.name: Power Word Stun
Spell.short_description: Stuns creature with 150 hp or less.

Spell.name: Prayer
Spell.area: all allies and foes within a 40-ft.-radius burst centered on you
Spell.short_description: Allies get +1 bonus on most rolls, enemies –1 penalty.
Spell.mythic_text: The spell's luck bonus increases to +2, and the penalty for enemies changes to -2. When you cast the spell, your affected allies heal an amount of hit point damage equal to double your tier, and affected enemies take an amount of damage equal to double your tier.

Spell.name: Prestidigitation
Spell.spell_level: bard 0, magus 0, sorcerer/wizard 0, psychic 0, mesmerist 0, medium 0
Spell.short_description: Performs minor tricks.

Spell.name: Prismatic Sphere
Spell.short_description: As prismatic wall, but surrounds on all sides.
Spell.mythic_text: When you cast the spell, you simultaneously create a prismatic spray that originates from one point on the sphere and radiates directly away from you. The save DC of this prismatic spray is the same as that of your mythic prismatic sphere.

Spell.name: Prismatic Spray
Spell.short_description: Rays hit subjects with variety of effects.

Spell.name: Prismatic Wall
Spell.short_description: Wall's colors have array of effects.

Spell.name: Prying Eyes, Greater
Spell.short_description: As prying eyes, but eyes have true seeing.

Spell.name: Produce Flame
Spell.short_description: 1d6 damage + 1/level, touch or thrown.

Spell.name: Programmed Image
Spell.short_description: As major image, plus triggered by event.

Spell.name: Project Image
Spell.short_description: Illusory double can talk and cast spells.

Spell.name: Protection From Arrows
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 2, alchemist 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2, bloodrager 2, psychic 2, spiritualist 2
Spell.short_description: Subject gains DR 10/magic against ranged attacks.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage reduction increases to 15/magic. The maximum damage prevented by the spell increases to 15 points per caster level (maximum 150 points). If the spell prevents all damage from a ranged weapon attack, it turns the projectile or weapon back on the attacker, using the same attack roll result. If the attacker is also protected by mythic protection from arrows and its spell completely prevents the damage from the rebounded attack, the weapon or projectile is destroyed.

Spell.name: Protection From Chaos
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, paladin 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, inquisitor 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, bloodrager 1, shaman 1, spiritualist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: +2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignment.
Spell.mythic_text: The bonuses to AC and on saves increase to +4. Any chaotic creature attempting to possess or exercise mental control over the target must attempt a Will save against this spell. If it fails, the creature takes 1d6 points of damage per 2 caster levels (maximum 5d6) from mental feedback. A chaotic creature that uses spell resistance to bypass the spell's protection against contact must successfully save or take this damage once each round it attacks the protected target.

Spell.name: Protection From Evil
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, inquisitor 1, paladin 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, bloodrager 1, shaman 1, spiritualist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: +2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignment.
Spell.mythic_text: The bonuses to AC and on saves increase to +4. Any evil creature attempting to possess or exercise mental control over the target must attempt a Will save against this spell. If it fails, the creature takes 1d6 points of damage per 2 caster levels (maximum 5d6) from mental feedback. An evil creature that uses spell resistance to bypass the spell's protection against contact must successfully save or take this damage once each round it attacks the protected target.

Spell.name: Protection From Good
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, inquisitor 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, antipaladin 1, bloodrager 1, shaman 1, spiritualist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: +2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignments.
Spell.mythic_text: The bonuses to AC and on saves increase to +4. Any good creature attempting to possess or exercise mental control over the target must attempt a Will save against this spell. If it fails, the creature takes 1d6 points of damage per 2 caster levels (maximum 5d6) from mental feedback. A good creature that uses spell resistance to bypass the spell's protection against contact must successfully save or take this damage once each round it attacks the protected target.

Spell.name: Protection From Law
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, inquisitor 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, antipaladin 1, bloodrager 1, shaman 1, spiritualist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: +2 to AC and saves, plus additional protection against selected alignments.
Spell.mythic_text: The bonuses to AC and on saves increase to +4. Any lawful creature attempting to possess or exercise mental control over the target must attempt a Will save against this spell. If it fails, the creature takes 1d6 points of damage per 2 caster levels (maximum 5d6) from mental feedback. A lawful creature that uses spell resistance to bypass the spell's protection against contact must successfully save or take this damage once each round it attacks the protected target.

Spell.name: Protection from Spells
Spell.short_description: Confers +8 resistance bonus.

Spell.name: Purify Food and Drink
Spell.short_description: Purifies 1 cu. ft./level of food or water.

Spell.name: Pyrotechnics
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, magus 2, bloodrager 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2
Spell.duration: 1d4+1 rounds, or 1d4+1 rounds after creatures leave the smoke cloud; see text
Spell.short_description: Turns fire into blinding light or choking smoke.

Spell.name: Quench
Spell.short_description: Extinguishes fires.

Spell.name: Rage
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, alchemist 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, witch 3, alchemist 3, bloodrager 3, psychic 3, mesmerist 2
Spell.short_description: Gives +2 to Str and Con, +1 on Will saves, –2 to AC.

Spell.name: Rainbow Pattern
Spell.short_description: Lights fascinate 24 HD of creatures.

Spell.name: Raise Dead
Spell.short_description: Restores life to subject who died as long as one day/level ago.

Spell.name: Ray Of Enfeeblement
Spell.short_description: Ray causes 1d6 Str penalty + 1 per 2 levels.
Spell.mythic_text: The Strength penalty increases to 1d8 + 1 per 2 caster levels (maximum +10). If the target fails its save, it's fatigued.

Spell.name: Ray of Exhaustion
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, magus 3, bloodrager 3, mesmerist 3, spiritualist 3
Spell.short_description: Ray makes subject exhausted.

Spell.name: Ray of Frost
Spell.short_description: Ray deals 1d3 cold damage.

Spell.name: Read Magic
Spell.spell_level: bard 0, cleric/oracle 0, druid 0, paladin 1, ranger 1, sorcerer/wizard 0, summoner/unchained summoner 0, witch 0, inquisitor 0, magus 0, shaman 0, occultist 0, psychic 0, mesmerist 0, spiritualist 0, medium 0
Spell.short_description: Read scrolls and spellbooks.

Spell.name: Reduce Person
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 1, alchemist 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, witch 1, magus 1, bloodrager 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Humanoid creature halves in size.
Spell.mythic_text: You can decrease the target's size by up to two categories, to a minimum of Tiny. If the target shrinks two sizes, its weight decreases by a factor of 16 and it gains a +4 size bonus to Dexterity, a -4 size penalty to Strength, and a +2 bonus on attack rolls and to AC because of its decreased size. A Medium or Small humanoid creature whose size decreases to Tiny has a space of 2-1/2 feet and a natural reach of 0 feet. Mythic reduce person counters and dispels mythic enlarge person.

Spell.name: Reduce Animal
Spell.short_description: Shrinks one willing animal.

Spell.name: Reduce Person, Mass
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner 3, bloodrager 4, psychic 4, unchained summoner 4
Spell.short_description: As reduce person, but affects 1 humanoid creature/level.

Spell.name: Refuge
Spell.short_description: Alters item to transport its possessor to you.

Spell.name: Regenerate
Spell.short_description: Subject’s severed limbs grow back, cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +35).
Spell.mythic_text: The casting time changes to 1 standard action and the target changes to 1 living creature or corpse touched. The spell removes the blinded, dazzled, and deafened conditions. The target gains regeneration equal to your tier (overcome by acid and fire) for 1 round per caster level. If the target was killed by amputation or decapitation (such as from a vorpal weapon) within the past 1 round, the spell regenerates lost body parts and brings the creature back to life (as breath of life), treating it as if it had negative hp equal to its Constitution score.

Spell.name: Reincarnate
Spell.short_description: Brings dead subject back in a random body.

Spell.name: Remove Blindness/Deafness
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, paladin 3, alchemist 3, witch 3, shaman 3, mesmerist 3, spiritualist 3
Spell.short_description: Cures normal or magical blindness or deafness.

Spell.name: Remove Curse
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, cleric/oracle 3, paladin 3, sorcerer/wizard 4, alchemist 3, witch 3, inquisitor 3, shaman 3, mesmerist 3, spiritualist 3, medium 3
Spell.short_description: Frees object or person from curse.

Spell.name: Remove Disease
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, druid 3, ranger 3, alchemist 3, witch 3, inquisitor 3, alchemist 3, witch 3, spiritualist 3
Spell.short_description: Cures all diseases affecting subject.

Spell.name: Remove Fear
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, cleric/oracle 1, inquisitor 1, shaman 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1, spiritualist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Suppresses fear or gives +4 on saves against fear for one subject + one per four levels.

Spell.name: Remove Paralysis
Spell.short_description: Frees creatures from paralysis or slow effect.

Spell.name: Repel Metal or Stone
Spell.short_description: Pushes away metal and stone.

Spell.name: Repel Vermin
Spell.short_description: Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10 ft. away.

Spell.name: Repel Wood
Spell.short_description: Pushes away wooden objects.
Spell.mythic_text: The casting time changes to 1 immediate action. You may cause one affected wooden object up to 5 inches in diameter to splinter and break.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the area changes to a 60-foot, cone-shaped emanation from you.

Spell.name: Repulsion
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 7, sorcerer/wizard 6, summoner 5, inquisitor 6, occultist 6, psychic 7, spiritualist 6, unchained summoner 6
Spell.area: up to 10-ft.-radius/level emanation centered on you
Spell.short_description: Creatures can’t approach you.

Spell.name: Resilient Sphere
Spell.short_description: Force globe protects but traps one subject.

Spell.name: Resistance
Spell.spell_level: bard 0, cleric/oracle 0, druid 0, paladin 1, sorcerer/wizard 0, summoner/unchained summoner 0, witch 0, inquisitor 0, shaman 0, occultist 0, psychic 0, spiritualist 0, medium 0
Spell.short_description: Subject gains +1 on saving throws.

Spell.name: Resist Energy
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 2, cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, inquisitor 2, paladin 2, ranger 1, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2, bloodrager 2, shaman 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, spiritualist 2
Spell.short_description: Ignores 10 (or more) points of damage/attack from specified energy type.
Spell.mythic_text: The target gains a +4 bonus on saves against effects that deal damage of the selected energy type. Once each round as a free action, the target can choose one adjacent ally to gain energy resistance 5 against the chosen energy type for 1 round. This increases to energy resistance 10 at caster level 7 and energy resistance 15 at caster level 11.

Spell.name: Restoration
Spell.short_description: Restores level and ability score drains.

Spell.name: Restoration, Greater
Spell.short_description: As restoration, plus restores all levels and ability scores.

Spell.name: Restoration, Lesser
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, paladin 1, inquisitor 2, alchemist 2, shaman 2, mesmerist 2, spiritualist 2
Spell.short_description: Dispels magical ability penalty or repairs 1d4 ability damage.

Spell.name: Resurrection
Spell.short_description: Fully restore dead subject.

Spell.name: Reverse Gravity
Spell.short_description: Objects and creatures fall upward.
Spell.mythic_text: Creatures in the area or that enter the area must succeed at a Fortitude save or be nauseated.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (8th): If you expend three uses of mythic power, once per round as a move action you may select one secured creature (one that succeeded at its Reflex save) or attached object (such as a tree or cottage) and force it to attempt a Fortitude save against the spell. The selected creature or object can weigh no more than 100 pounds per caster level. If it fails the save, it's pulled free and falls upward.

Spell.name: Righteous Might
Spell.short_description: Your size increases, and you gain bonuses in combat.

Spell.name: Rope Trick
Spell.short_description: As many as eight creatures hide in extradimensional space.

Spell.name: Rusting Grasp
Spell.short_description: Your touch corrodes iron and alloys.

Spell.name: Sanctuary
Spell.short_description: Opponents can't attack you, and you can't attack.
Spell.mythic_text: If an attacker succeeds at its Will save to attack the protected target, add your tier to the target's AC against the attack. If the target uses a healing spell or ability on another creature, that creature gains the benefit of non-mythic sanctuary for 1 round. If the creature breaks the non-mythic sanctuary by attacking, subsequent healing by the target doesn't create another non-mythic sanctuary effect on the creature.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (2nd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, select a number of additional creatures equal to half your tier that are within reach. These creatures gain the benefit of non-mythic sanctuary.

Spell.name: Scare
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, antipaladin 2, shaman 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, spiritualist 2, medium 2
Spell.duration: 1 round/level or 1 round; see text for cause fear
Spell.short_description: Frightens creature of less than 6 HD.

Spell.name: Scintillating Pattern
Spell.short_description: Twisting colors confuse, stun, or render unconscious.

Spell.name: Scorching Ray
Spell.short_description: Ranged touch attack deals 4d6 fire damage, + 1 ray/four levels (max 3).
Spell.mythic_text: Each ray's damage increases to 6d6 points of fire damage. The first ray bypasses fire resistance and immunity.

Spell.name: Screen
Spell.short_description: Illusion hides area from vision and scrying.

Spell.name: Scrying
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, cleric/oracle 5, druid 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, witch 4, shaman 4, occultist 4, psychic 4, mesmerist 3, spiritualist 5, medium 3
Spell.short_description: Spies on subject from a distance.

Spell.name: Scrying, Greater
Spell.spell_level: bard 6, cleric/oracle 7, druid 7, sorcerer/wizard 7, witch 7, shaman 7, occultist 6, psychic 7, mesmerist 6
Spell.short_description: As scrying, but faster and longer.

Spell.name: Sculpt Sound
Spell.short_description: Creates new sounds or changes existing ones into new sounds.

Spell.name: Searing Light
Spell.short_description: Ray deals 1d8/two levels damage (more against undead).
Spell.mythic_text: The spell's damage increases to 1d6 per caster level (maximum 10d6). The damage dealt to an undead creature increases to 1d8 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d8), or 2d6 per caster level (maximum 20d6) if the undead is vulnerable to bright light. The damage dealt to constructs increases to 1d8 points of damage per 2 caster levels (maximum 5d8). If a creature struck has light sensitivity or light blindness, it takes the penalty from that weakness for 1 round after being struck by the light.

Spell.name: Secret Chest
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 5, witch 5, occultist 5, psychic 5, mesmerist 5, spiritualist 5
Spell.short_description: Hides expensive chest on Ethereal Plane; you retrieve it at will.

Spell.name: Secret Page
Spell.short_description: Changes one page to hide its real content.

Spell.name: Secure Shelter
Spell.short_description: Creates sturdy cottage.

Spell.name: See Invisibility
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, sorcerer/wizard 2, alchemist 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2, witch 2, inquisitor 2, bloodrager 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 3, spiritualist 2
Spell.short_description: Reveals invisible creatures or objects.

Spell.name: Seeming
Spell.spell_level: bard 5, sorcerer/wizard 5, occultist 5, psychic 5, mesmerist 5, medium 4
Spell.short_description: Changes appearance of one person per two levels.

Spell.name: Sending
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 4, sorcerer/wizard 5, alchemist 5, summoner 4, inquisitor 4, shaman 4, occultist 4, psychic 4, mesmerist 3, spiritualist 5, unchained summoner 5, medium 3
Spell.short_description: Delivers short message anywhere, instantly.

Spell.name: Sepia Snake Sigil
Spell.duration: permanent or until discharged; until released or 1d4 days + 1 day/level; see text
Spell.short_description: Creates a snake-shaped text symbol that immobilizes reader.

Spell.name: Sequester
Spell.short_description: Subject is invisible to sight and scrying; renders creature comatose.

Spell.name: Shadow Conjuration
Spell.short_description: Mimics conjuration below 4th level, but only 20% real.

Spell.name: Shades
Spell.short_description: As shadow conjuration, but up to 8th level and 80% real.

Spell.name: Shadow Conjuration, Greater
Spell.short_description: As shadow conjuration, but up to 6th level and 60% real.

Spell.name: Shadow Evocation
Spell.short_description: Mimics evocation of lower than 5th level, but only 20% real.

Spell.name: Shadow Evocation, Greater
Spell.short_description: As shadow evocation, but up to 7th level and 60% real.

Spell.name: Shadow Walk
Spell.short_description: Step into shadow to travel rapidly.

Spell.name: Shambler
Spell.short_description: Creates 1d4+2 shambling mounds to fight for you.

Spell.name: Shapechange
Spell.short_description: Transforms you into certain creatures, and you can change forms once per round.

Spell.name: Shatter
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, magus 2, bloodrager 2, occultist 2, psychic 2
Spell.area: 5-ft.-radius spread; or one solid object or one crystalline creature
Spell.short_description: Sonic vibration damages objects or crystalline creatures.
Spell.mythic_text: Add your tier to your caster level when determining the maximum object weight you can affect. When targeting a crystalline creature, the spell's damage increases to 1d8 points of sonic damage per caster level (maximum 10d8). You may damage a single magical object as if it were a crystalline creature. If the spell destroys an object or damages a crystalline creature, broken shards litter the spell area or creature's space and act as caltrops.

Spell.name: Shield
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 1, alchemist 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, magus 1, bloodrager 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, spiritualist 1
Spell.short_description: Invisible disc gives +4 to AC, blocks magic missiles.

Spell.name: Shield Of Faith
Spell.short_description: Aura grants +2 or higher deflection bonus.
Spell.mythic_text: Add half your tier to the spell's deflection bonus.

Spell.name: Shield of Law
Spell.short_description: +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against chaotic spells.

Spell.name: Shield Other
Spell.short_description: You take half of subject’s damage.
Spell.mythic_text: Increase the range to long (400 feet + 40 feet per caster level). Subtract your tier from any damage transmitted to you through the mystical connection before applying the damage (minimum 1 hp of damage). When you use your surge ability to modify a saving throw against an effect that also affects your linked ally, the ally also applies your surge bonus die result to the ally's saving throw. If the ally also uses its own surge ability, it takes either your result or its result, whichever is higher.

Spell.name: Shillelagh
Spell.short_description: Cudgel or quarterstaff becomes +1 weapon (2d6 damage) for 1 min./level.

Spell.name: Shrink Item
Spell.short_description: Object shrinks to one-sixteenth size.

Spell.name: Shocking Grasp
Spell.short_description: Touch delivers 1d6/level electricity damage (max 5d6).
Spell.mythic_text: The spell's damage increases to 1d8 points of electricity damage per caster level (maximum 5d8). If the target is wearing metal armor or is made of metal, you may attempt a free grapple combat maneuver against the target. Alternatively, if the target is carrying a metal weapon, you may attempt a free disarm combat maneuver against that weapon. This free combat maneuver doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity.
Spell.augmented: Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power and the free grapple or disarm combat maneuver is successful, the target is staggered until your next turn. This is an electricity effect.

Spell.name: Shout
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, magus 4, bloodrager 4, occultist 4, psychic 4
Spell.short_description: Deafens all within cone and deals 5d6 sonic damage.
Spell.mythic_text: The duration that creatures in the area are deafened increases to 4d6 rounds, and the damage dealt increases to 5d8 points of sonic damage. The damage dealt to crystalline creatures and exposed brittle or crystalline objects increases to 1d8 points of sonic damage per caster level (maximum 15d8). Crystalline creatures reverberate with sonic energy, taking 4 points of sonic damage on your turn for a number of rounds equal to your tier.

Spell.name: Shout, Greater
Spell.short_description: Devastating yell deals 10d6 sonic damage; stuns creatures.

Spell.name: Silence
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, inquisitor 2, antipaladin 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2
Spell.area: 20-ft.-radius emanation centered on a creature, object, or point in space
Spell.short_description: Negates sound in 20-ft. radius.
Spell.mythic_text: This spell also applies to telepathy, cutting off any mental communication within the area. At the time of casting, you can choose to be immune to your own mythic silence effect and can designate up to one creature per tier to also gain this immunity. Creatures immune to the mythic silence are subject to sonic effects as normal.

Spell.name: Silent Image
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, magus 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Creates minor illusion of your design.
Spell.mythic_text: The duration increases to concentration + 1 round per caster level, and the effect increases to a visual figment that can't extend beyond eight 10-foot cubes + 1 10-foot cube per caster level.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the duration changes to concentration + 1 minute per caster level and the effect changes to a visual figment no larger than a 50-foot emanation. An augmented mythic silent image can't move.

Spell.name: Simulacrum
Spell.short_description: Creates partially real double of a creature.

Spell.name: Slay Living
Spell.short_description: Touch attack deals 12d6 +1 per level.

Spell.name: Sleep
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, shaman 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1
Spell.area: one or more living creatures within a 10-ft.-radius burst
Spell.short_description: Puts 4 HD of creatures into magical slumber.
Spell.mythic_text: The spell affects up to 8 Hit Dice of creatures, and you can choose the order in which creatures are affected by the spell. Any effect that would automatically awaken a sleeping creature instead allows it to attempt a new Will saving throw to awaken.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (8th): If you expend three uses of mythic power, you can target all living creatures other than you that have 8 Hit Dice or fewer in a 1-mile radius centered on you. Creatures that fail their saving throws fall asleep for a number of days equal to your tier. You can select a number of creatures up to your tier to not be affected by the spell.

Spell.name: Sleet Storm
Spell.spell_level: druid 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, magus 3, bloodrager 3, shaman 3
Spell.short_description: Hampers vision and movement.

Spell.name: Slow
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner 2, magus 3, bloodrager 3, occultist 3, psychic 3, spiritualist 3, unchained summoner 3, medium 2
Spell.short_description: One subject/level takes only one action/round, –1 to AC, Reflex saves, and attack rolls.
Spell.mythic_text: The penalty on attack rolls, on Reflex saves, and to AC increases to -2, and affected creatures move at one-fourth speed. Select one affected creature; this creature is denied its Dexterity bonus to AC.

Spell.name: Snare
Spell.short_description: Creates a magic booby trap.

Spell.name: Soften Earth and Stone
Spell.short_description: Turns stone to clay, or dirt to sand or mud.

Spell.name: Solid Fog
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 4, witch 4, magus 4, shaman 4, mesmerist 4, spiritualist 4, unchained summoner 4
Spell.short_description: Blocks vision and slows movement.
Spell.mythic_text: The penalty on melee attack and damage rolls increases to -4. The cloud's radius and height both increase to 50 feet.
Spell.augmented: Augmented: The augmented version of mythic solid fog has the same additional benefits as the augmented version of mythic fog cloud.

Spell.name: Song of Discord
Spell.short_description: Forces targets to attack each other.

Spell.name: Soul Bind
Spell.short_description: Traps newly dead soul to prevent resurrection.

Spell.name: Sound Burst
Spell.short_description: Deals 1d8 sonic damage and may stun subjects.

Spell.name: Speak with Animals
Spell.short_description: You can communicate with animals.

Spell.name: Speak with Dead
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, witch 3, inquisitor 3, shaman 3, psychic 3, spiritualist 3, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Corpse answers one question/two levels.

Spell.name: Speak with Plants
Spell.short_description: You can talk to plants and plant creatures.

Spell.name: Spectral Hand
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, spiritualist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Creates disembodied glowing hand to deliver touch attacks.

Spell.name: Spell Immunity
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 4, alchemist 4, inquisitor 4, occultist 4, psychic 4, spiritualist 4
Spell.short_description: Subject is immune to one spell per 4 levels.

Spell.name: Spell Immunity, Greater
Spell.short_description: As spell immunity, but up to 8th-level spells.

Spell.name: Spell Resistance
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 5, alchemist 5, inquisitor 5, occultist 5, psychic 5, spiritualist 5
Spell.short_description: Subject gains SR 12 + level.

Spell.name: Spellstaff
Spell.short_description: Stores one spell in wooden quarterstaff.

Spell.name: Spell Turning
Spell.short_description: Reflect 1d4+6 spell levels back at caster.

Spell.name: Spider Climb
Spell.spell_level: druid 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, alchemist 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2, magus 2, bloodrager 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Grants ability to walk on walls and ceilings.
Spell.mythic_text: The target gains a climb speed equal to its base land speed or 30 feet, whichever is higher. The target can take the run action while climbing and needs only one hand free to climb. The target can move freely across spider webs (including giant spider webs), web spells, and similar adhesives of 2nd level or less (including tanglefoot bags) as if it were using freedom of movement.

Spell.name: Spike Growth
Spell.short_description: Creatures in area take 1d4 damage, may be slowed.

Spell.name: Spike Stones
Spell.short_description: Creatures in area take 1d8 damage, may also be slowed.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 2d6 points of piercing damage plus 1 point of bleed damage. Add your tier to the DC to detect the magical trap.

Spell.name: Spiritual Weapon
Spell.short_description: Magic weapon attacks on its own.
Spell.mythic_text: The weapon gains your choice of one of the following magic weapon special abilities: flaming, frost, keen, merciful, shock, or thundering. Before or after the weapon attempts all of its attacks for the round, you can redirect it to a different target as a swift action instead of a move action.

Spell.name: Stabilize
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 0, druid 0, witch 0, inquisitor 0, shaman 0, occultist 0, psychic 0, spiritualist 0, medium 0
Spell.short_description: Cause a dying creature to stabilize.

Spell.name: Statue
Spell.short_description: Subject can become a statue at will.

Spell.name: Status
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 2, witch 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, spiritualist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Monitors condition, position of allies.

Spell.name: Stinking Cloud
Spell.spell_level: magus 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, bloodrager 3, shaman 3, unchained summoner 3
Spell.short_description: Nauseating vapors, 1 round/level.
Spell.mythic_text: Creatures that succeed at their saves are sickened while they remain in the cloud and for 1d4+1 rounds after they leave. Creatures that fail their saves continue to be sickened for 1 hour after leaving the cloud.

Spell.name: Stone Shape
Spell.short_description: Sculpts stone into any shape.
Spell.mythic_text: The duration changes to 1 round/level and instantaneous (see text). Each round after the round you cast the spell, you can spend a standard action to shape up to 5 additional cubic feet of stone you touch. Shaped stone has an instantaneous duration (meaning it does not revert to its previous form when the spell ends).

Spell.name: Stoneskin
Spell.spell_level: druid 5, sorcerer/wizard 4, alchemist 4, summoner 3, inquisitor 4, magus 4, bloodrager 4, shaman 5, occultist 4, psychic 4, unchained summoner 4
Spell.short_description: Grants DR 10/adamantine.
Spell.mythic_text: The target gains a +4 bonus on saving throws against disease, poison, and stun effects. There is a 50% chance any critical hit or sneak attack against the target is treated as a normal hit, as if the target were wearing medium fortification armor.

Spell.name: Stone Tell
Spell.short_description: Talk to natural or worked stone.

Spell.name: Stone to Flesh
Spell.short_description: Restores petrified creature.

Spell.name: Storm Of Vengeance
Spell.short_description: Storm rains acid, lightning, and hail.
Spell.mythic_text: The acid damage dealt increases to 1d8 points of acid damage. The lightning damage dealt increases to 10d8 points of electricity damage. You can call down a bolt of lightning on the 2nd and 4th rounds (equivalent to those on the 3rd round). You can strike the same target with a bolt more than once during the casting of the spell, but not more than once per round.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (7th): If you expend three uses of mythic power, the storm cloud's radius increases to 1,000 feet. Structures in the storm take 1d10 points of damage per round (this damage bypasses hardness). You can call down one additional bolt in the 2nd and 4th rounds, and three additional bolts in the 3rd round.

Spell.name: Suggestion
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, occultist 3, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Compels subject to follow stated course of action.
Spell.mythic_text: Mythic suggestion loses the language-dependent descriptor, and can target one or more living creatures in a 10-foot-radius burst.

Spell.name: Suggestion, Mass
Spell.spell_level: bard 5, sorcerer/wizard 6, witch 6, occultist 5, psychic 5, mesmerist 5
Spell.short_description: As suggestion, affects subject/level.

Spell.name: Summon Instrument
Spell.short_description: Summons one musical instrument.

Spell.name: Summon Monster I
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, cleric/oracle 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, witch 1, antipaladin 1, psychic 1, spiritualist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: (Evil creatures only.) Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

Spell.name: Summon Monster II
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2, witch 2, antipaladin 2, psychic 2, spiritualist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: (Evil creatures only.) Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

Spell.name: Summon Monster III
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, cleric/oracle 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, antipaladin 3, psychic 3, spiritualist 3
Spell.short_description: (Evil creatures only.) Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

Spell.name: Summon Monster IV
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, cleric/oracle 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner/unchained summoner 3, witch 4, antipaladin 4, psychic 4, spiritualist 4, medium 3
Spell.short_description: (Evil creatures only.) Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

Spell.name: Summon Monster V
Spell.spell_level: bard 5, cleric/oracle 5, sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner/unchained summoner 4, witch 5, psychic 5, spiritualist 5, medium 4
Spell.short_description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

Spell.name: Summon Monster VI
Spell.spell_level: bard 6, cleric/oracle 6, sorcerer/wizard 6, witch 6, psychic 6, spiritualist 6, unchained summoner 5
Spell.short_description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

Spell.name: Summon Monster VIII
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 8, sorcerer/wizard 8, witch 8, summoner/unchained summoner 6, psychic 8
Spell.short_description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

Spell.name: Summon Monster VII
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 7, sorcerer/wizard 7, summoner 5, witch 7, psychic 7, unchained summoner 6
Spell.short_description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

Spell.name: Summon Monster IX
Spell.short_description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

Spell.name: Summon Nature's Ally I
Spell.short_description: Summons creature to fight.

Spell.name: Summon Nature's Ally II
Spell.short_description: Summons creature to fight.

Spell.name: Summon Nature's Ally III
Spell.short_description: Summons creature to fight.

Spell.name: Summon Nature's Ally IV
Spell.short_description: Summons creature to fight.

Spell.name: Summon Nature's Ally V
Spell.short_description: Summons creature to fight.

Spell.name: Summon Nature's Ally VI
Spell.short_description: Summons creature to fight.

Spell.name: Summon Nature's Ally VII
Spell.short_description: Summons creature to fight.

Spell.name: Summon Nature's Ally VIII
Spell.short_description: Summons creature to fight.

Spell.name: Summon Nature's Ally IX
Spell.short_description: Summons creature to fight.

Spell.name: Summon Swarm
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, druid 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2, witch 2, shaman 2
Spell.short_description: Summons swarm of bats, rats, or spiders.
Spell.mythic_text: The swarm has the advanced simple template. A swarm of rats or spiders leaves behind a trail of filth or ichor when it moves, which has the effects of a grease spell for 1 round after the swarm passes through an area. Any creature that moves through the affected area is also subject to the swarm's disease or poison, as if attacked by the swarm. A prone creature in the affected area takes a -4 penalty on its saving throw against this affliction. A bat swarm leaves behind a similar trail that lasts for 2 rounds but doesn't have a disease or poison effect.

Spell.name: Sunbeam
Spell.duration: 1 round/level or until all beams are exhausted
Spell.short_description: Beam blinds and deals 4d6 damage.
Spell.mythic_text: You call forth one beam per 2 caster levels instead of per 3. The damage dealt increases to 4d8 points of damage. The damage dealt to undead creatures, fungi, mold, oozes, and slimes increases to 1d8 points of damage per caster level (maximum 20d8). Any creature that successfully saves against a beam is dazzled for 1 minute.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (9th): If you expend three uses of mythic power, the first beam you create has a duration of 1 round per 2 caster levels, and deals maximum damage on the round you cast it. Creatures in the beam can attempt saving throws to avoid blindness, but not the spell's damage.

Spell.name: Sunburst
Spell.short_description: Blinds all within 10 ft., deals 6d6 damage.

Spell.name: Symbol of Death
Spell.short_description: Triggered rune kills nearby creatures.

Spell.name: Symbol of Fear
Spell.short_description: Triggered rune panics nearby creatures.

Spell.name: Symbol of Insanity
Spell.short_description: Triggered rune renders nearby creatures insane.

Spell.name: Symbol of Pain
Spell.short_description: Triggered rune wracks nearby creatures with pain.

Spell.name: Symbol of Persuasion
Spell.short_description: Triggered rune charms nearby creatures.

Spell.name: Symbol of Sleep
Spell.short_description: Triggered rune puts nearby creatures into catatonic slumber.

Spell.name: Symbol of Stunning
Spell.short_description: Triggered rune stuns nearby creatures.

Spell.name: Symbol Of Weakness
Spell.short_description: Triggered rune weakens nearby creatures.

Spell.name: Sympathetic Vibration
Spell.short_description: Deals 2d10 damage/round to freestanding structure.

Spell.name: Sympathy
Spell.spell_level: druid 9, sorcerer/wizard 8, summoner/unchained summoner 6, witch 8, occultist 6, psychic 8
Spell.short_description: Object or location attracts certain creatures.

Spell.name: Telekinesis
Spell.duration: concentration (up to 1 round/level) or instantaneous; see text
Spell.short_description: Moves object, attacks creature, or hurls object or creature.
Spell.mythic_text: The duration of this spell changes to 1 round per level. You may spend a move action to use the sustained force or combat maneuver effects of the spell. When using sustained force, you can move a number of objects up to your tier. These must be in the same square and together must weigh no more than the weight limit of the spell. Using the violent thrust effect ends the spell, but the weight restriction increases to 50 pounds per caster level (maximum 750 pounds).

Spell.name: Telekinetic Sphere
Spell.short_description: As resilient sphere, but you move the sphere telekinetically.

Spell.name: Telepathic Bond
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 5, witch 5, inquisitor 5, psychic 4, mesmerist 4, spiritualist 5, medium 4
Spell.short_description: Link lets allies communicate.

Spell.name: Teleport
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner 4, witch 5, magus 5, occultist 5, psychic 5, spiritualist 5, unchained summoner 5, medium 4
Spell.short_description: Instantly transports you as far as 100 miles per level.

Spell.name: Teleport, Greater
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 7, summoner 5, witch 7, psychic 7, unchained summoner 6
Spell.short_description: As teleport, but no range limit and no off-target arrival.

Spell.name: Teleport Object
Spell.short_description: As teleport, but affects a touched object.

Spell.name: Teleportation Circle
Spell.short_description: Teleports creatures inside circle.

Spell.name: Temporal Stasis
Spell.short_description: Puts subject into suspended animation.

Spell.name: Time Stop
Spell.short_description: You act freely for 1d4+1 rounds.
Spell.mythic_text: Select a number of creatures equal to half your tier or fewer within close range (25 feet + 5 feet per 2 caster levels). Mythic time stop has the same effect on these creatures as it does on you, allowing them to act for the same number of rounds of apparent time that you can. You and these creatures can all interact with one another normally while time appears to be stopped.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (10th): If you expend three uses of mythic power, the duration increases to 1 hour per level of apparent time. You and other affected creatures gain no benefit from rest or sleep while the spell is active.

Spell.name: Tiny Hut
Spell.short_description: Creates shelter for 10 creatures.

Spell.name: Tongues
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 4, sorcerer/wizard 3, alchemist 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, witch 3, inquisitor 2, shaman 4, psychic 3, mesmerist 2, spiritualist 3, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Speak and understand any language.

Spell.name: Touch of Fatigue
Spell.short_description: Touch attack fatigues target.

Spell.name: Touch of Idiocy
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, bloodrager 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, spiritualist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Subject takes 1d6 penalty to Int, Wis, and Cha.

Spell.name: Transformation
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 6, alchemist 6, witch 6, magus 6, occultist 6, psychic 6, spiritualist 6
Spell.short_description: You gain combat bonuses.
Spell.mythic_text: You can still cast spells and use spell completion and spell trigger items, but the level of the spell you're casting or using must be equal to or less than your tier. You gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your caster level.

Spell.name: Transmute Metal to Wood
Spell.area: all metal objects within a 40-ft.-radius burst
Spell.short_description: Metal within 40 ft. becomes wood.

Spell.name: Transmute Mud to Rock
Spell.short_description: Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

Spell.name: Transmute Rock to Mud
Spell.short_description: Transforms two 10-ft. cubes per level.

Spell.name: Transport via Plants
Spell.short_description: Move instantly from one plant to another of the same kind.

Spell.name: Trap the Soul
Spell.short_description: Imprisons subject within gem.

Spell.name: Tree Shape
Spell.short_description: You look exactly like a tree for 1 hour/level.

Spell.name: Tree Stride
Spell.duration: 1 hour/level or until expended; see text
Spell.short_description: Step from one tree to another far away.

Spell.name: True Resurrection
Spell.short_description: As resurrection, plus remains aren't needed.

Spell.name: True Seeing
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 5, druid 7, sorcerer/wizard 6, alchemist 6, summoner 5, witch 6, inquisitor 5, magus 6, shaman 5, occultist 5, psychic 5, mesmerist 6, spiritualist 6, unchained summoner 6, medium 4
Spell.short_description: Lets you see all things as they really are.

Spell.name: True Strike
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 1, alchemist 1, inquisitor 1, magus 1, bloodrager 1, psychic 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: +20 on your next attack roll.
Spell.mythic_text: The affected attack bypasses all damage reduction.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (2nd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you gain a +10 insight bonus on your second attack that round and a +5 insight bonus on your third attack that round. The second and third attacks can be on your turn or on another creature's turn before your next turn (such as when you attempt an attack of opportunity).

Spell.name: Undeath to Death
Spell.area: several undead creatures within a 40-ft.-radius burst
Spell.short_description: Destroys 1d4 HD/level undead (max. 20d4).

Spell.name: Undetectable Alignment
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, cleric/oracle 2, paladin 2, alchemist 2, inquisitor 2, antipaladin 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 1
Spell.short_description: Conceals alignment for 24 hours.

Spell.name: Unhallow
Spell.area: 40-ft. radius emanating from the touched point
Spell.short_description: Designates location as unholy.

Spell.name: Unholy Aura
Spell.short_description: +4 to AC, +4 resistance, and SR 25 against good spells.

Spell.name: Unholy Blight
Spell.short_description: Harms and sickens good creatures (1d8 damage/2 levels).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt to good outsiders increases to 1d10 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d10) and the damage dealt to other good creatures increases to 1d12 points of damage per 2 caster levels (maximum 5d12). The duration that creatures within the area are sickened increases to 2d4 rounds. On a successful save, a good creature is slowed for 1 round.

Spell.name: Unseen Servant
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, witch 1, magus 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1, spiritualist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Invisible force obeys your commands.

Spell.name: Vampiric Touch
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, antipaladin 3, magus 3, bloodrager 3, psychic 3, mesmerist 3, spiritualist 3, medium 3
Spell.short_description: Touch deals 1d6 damage/2 levels; caster gains damage as temporary hp.
Spell.mythic_text: The spell's damage increases to 1d8 points of damage per 2 caster levels (maximum 10d8). Your melee touch attack to deliver the spell threatens a critical hit on a 19 or 20. This expanded threat range doesn't stack with other effects or abilities that increase the threat range. If the damage kills the target, you gain fast healing 5 for a number of rounds equal to the Hit Dice of the target.

Spell.name: Veil
Spell.short_description: Changes appearance of group of creatures.

Spell.name: Ventriloquism
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1, spiritualist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Throws voice for 1 min./level.

Spell.name: Virtue
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 0, druid 0, paladin 1, inquisitor 0, shaman 0, psychic 0, spiritualist 0, medium 0
Spell.short_description: Subject gains 1 temporary hp.

Spell.name: Vision
Spell.short_description: As legend lore, but quicker.

Spell.name: Wail of the Banshee
Spell.short_description: Deals 10 damage/level to 1 creature/level.

Spell.name: Wall Of Fire
Spell.spell_level: druid 5, sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner 3, magus 4, bloodrager 4, shaman 5, occultist 4, unchained summoner 4
Spell.short_description: Deals 2d4 fire damage out to 10 ft. and 1d4 out to 20 ft. Passing through wall deals 2d6 damage +1/level.
Spell.mythic_text: The wall's damage increases to 2d6 points of fire damage to creatures within 10 feet, 1d6 points of fire damage to those past 10 feet but within 20 feet, and 2d8 points of fire damage + 1 point of fire damage per caster level (maximum +20) to any creature passing through it. Any creature that passes through the wall or is within 5 feet of the wall when it's created must succeed at a Reflex save or catch fire. Attempts to extinguish this fire use the spell's save DC.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (5th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you may move the wall 5 feet in any direction as a move action on your turn. Moving the wall into a fireproof barrier (such as a stone wall) destroys the part of the wall that overlaps the barrier.

Spell.name: Wall Of Force
Spell.short_description: Wall is immune to damage.
Spell.mythic_text: The wall's hardness increases to 40, and its hit points increase to 30 per caster level. A non-mythic disintegrate spell or rod of cancellation negates a 10-foot-square section of a mythic wall of force for 1 round, after which the wall reforms at full strength. One side of the wall (chosen by you) repels creatures within 5 feet as a repulsion spell (using the DC wall of force would have if it allowed a saving throw).

Spell.name: Wall Of Ice
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner 3, magus 4, bloodrager 4, occultist 4, unchained summoner 4
Spell.short_description: Ice plane creates wall or hemisphere creates dome.
Spell.mythic_text: The wall's hit points increase to 5 hit points per inch of thickness. Add your tier to the Strength check DC to break through the wall. The damage dealt to those that step through the wall increases to 1d8 points of cold damage + 1 point per caster level. Any creature that passes through the wall must succeed at a Fortitude save or be staggered for 1d4 rounds; this is a cold effect.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (5th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you cover the wall in sharp, protruding icicles. Any creature that touches, strikes, or breaks through the wall takes 1d6 points of cold damage, 1d6 points of piercing damage, and 1 point of bleed damage.

Spell.name: Wall of Iron
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 6, summoner 5, magus 6, occultist 6, unchained summoner 6
Spell.short_description: 30 hp/four levels; can topple onto foes.

Spell.name: Wall Of Thorns
Spell.short_description: Thorns damage anyone who tries to pass.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 30 minus the creature's AC. Any creature adjacent to the wall is automatically grappled by it. Any creature that begins its turn grappled by the wall takes 2d6 points of damage. Half of this damage is bludgeoning, and the other half is piercing. For the purpose of escaping this grapple, the wall's CMD is 10 + your caster level + your tier.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the wall automatically grapples creatures other than you within 10 feet. Any creature grappled by the wall takes 2d6 points of bleed damage. If a creature doesn't escape the wall's grapple, on its next turn the wall automatically pins it.

Spell.name: Warp Wood
Spell.short_description: Bends wood.

Spell.name: Water Breathing
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, druid 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, alchemist 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, magus 3, bloodrager 3, shaman 3, psychic 3
Spell.short_description: Subjects can breathe underwater.

Spell.name: Water Walk
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, ranger 3, witch 3, shaman 3, psychic 3, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Subject treads on water as if solid.

Spell.name: Waves of Exhaustion
Spell.short_description: Several targets become exhausted.

Spell.name: Waves of Fatigue
Spell.short_description: Several targets become fatigued.

Spell.name: Web
Spell.short_description: Fills 20-ft.-radius spread with sticky spiderwebs that can grapple foes and impair movement.
Spell.mythic_text: The webs are filled with spider swarms (one spider swarm for each 10-foot-by-10-foot area covered in webs). Any creature caught in or moving through the webs is attacked by a spider swarm (or multiple swarms, if it passes through the space of more than one swarm). The spiders don't leave the area of webbing. Destroying the web in an area destroys the swarm there as well, and completely destroying the web destroys all the swarms.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (5th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the webs increase to a 50-foot-radius spread. Webs span any gaps between available anchor points in the area, possibly creating multiple non-contiguous webbed areas. Non-mythic abilities that make creatures immune to webs (such as freedom of movement) instead give them a +5 bonus on saves, combat maneuver checks, and Escape Artist checks against mythic web.

Spell.name: Weird
Spell.short_description: As phantasmal killer, but affects all within 30 ft.

Spell.name: Whirlwind
Spell.short_description: Cyclone deals damage and can pick up creatures.

Spell.name: Whispering Wind
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, inquisitor 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, medium 2
Spell.duration: no more than 1 hour/level or until discharged (destination is reached)
Spell.short_description: Sends a short message 1 mile/level.

Spell.name: Wind Walk
Spell.short_description: You and your allies turn vaporous and travel fast.

Spell.name: Wind Wall
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, druid 3, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner 2, magus 3, bloodrager 3, shaman 3, occultist 3, spiritualist 3, unchained summoner 3
Spell.short_description: Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.

Spell.name: Wish
Spell.short_description: As limited wish, but with fewer limits.
Spell.bloodline: Arcane (19), Djinni (19), Draconic (19), Efreeti (19), Marid (19), Shaitan (19), Div (19), Impossible (19)

Spell.name: Wood Shape
Spell.short_description: Reshapes wooden objects to suit you.

Spell.name: Word of Recall
Spell.short_description: Teleports you back to designated place.

Spell.name: Word Of Chaos
Spell.area: nonchaotic creatures in a 40-ft.-radius spread centered on you
Spell.short_description: Kills, confuses, stuns, or deafens nonchaotic subjects.
Spell.mythic_text: When determining the spell's effect on non-mythic creatures, add your tier to your caster level. Non-chaotic creatures that fail their saves against the spell also take a -4 penalty on attack rolls and saving throws, and their spell resistance decreases by 5 for as long as the spell's other effects last.

Spell.name: Zone of Silence
Spell.short_description: Keeps eavesdroppers from overhearing you.

Spell.name: Zone of Truth
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 2, paladin 2, witch 2, inquisitor 2, psychic 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Subjects within range cannot lie.

Spell.name: Wall Of Stone
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 5, druid 6, sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner 4, magus 5, shaman 6, occultist 5, unchained summoner 5
Spell.short_description: Creates a stone wall that can be shaped.
Spell.mythic_text: The wall is 1 inch thick per 2 caster levels. The wall's hardness increases to 12.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (7th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the wall is impassable to ethereal travel and spells such as passwall and phase door. The wall is immune to non-mythic disintegrate, shatter, sympathetic vibration, and other non-mythic magical effects that specifically affect stone (including earthquake, soften earth and stone, and transmute rock to mud).

Spell.name: Agonize
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, sorcerer/wizard 4, occultist 3, psychic 4, unchained summoner 4
Spell.short_description: Pain encourages an outsider to obey you.

Spell.name: Fear
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, sorcerer/wizard 4, witch 4, inquisitor 4, antipaladin 4, bloodrager 4, shaman 4, occultist 4, psychic 4, mesmerist 3, spiritualist 4, medium 4
Spell.short_description: Subjects within cone flee for 1 round/level.

Spell.name: Hold Animal
Spell.short_description: Paralyzes one animal for 1 round/level.

Spell.name: Insect Plague
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 5, druid 5, summoner 4, shaman 5, unchained summoner 5
Spell.short_description: Wasp swarms attack creatures.

Spell.name: Baleful Polymorph
Spell.spell_level: druid 5, sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner 4, witch 5, magus 5, shaman 5, unchained summoner 5
Spell.short_description: Transforms subject into harmless animal.
Spell.mythic_text: The saving throw changes to Fortitude (partial) and Will (partial). A creature that fails the Fortitude save automatically fails the Will save. A target with the shapechanger subtype that fails its save can't use its shapechanging to shift out of its new form. A creature that succeeds at the Fortitude save is partially transformed into the intended animal. For 1 minute per level, it takes on cosmetic features appropriate to that animal and becomes one size category closer to the animal's size.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (9th): If you expend four uses of mythic power, the spell affects all other creatures with 8 Hit Dice or fewer in a 1-mile radius. Affected creatures transform into Small or smaller animals appropriate to the local environment. You can select a number of creatures up to your tier to not be affected.

Spell.name: Prying Eyes
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 5, witch 5, occultist 5, psychic 5, mesmerist 5, spiritualist 5
Spell.short_description: 1d4 + 1/level floating eyes scout for you.

Spell.name: Instant Summons
Spell.short_description: Prepared object appears in your hand.

Spell.name: Protection from Energy
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, druid 3, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, alchemist 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, inquisitor 3, bloodrager 3, shaman 3, occultist 3, psychic 3, spiritualist 3
Spell.short_description: Absorb 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy.

Spell.name: Absorbing Touch
Spell.short_description: Caster absorbs an item for 1 day/level.

Spell.name: Accelerate Poison
Spell.short_description: Hastens targeted poison’s onset.

Spell.name: Acid Pit
Spell.short_description: Creates a pit with a layer of acid on the bottom.

Spell.name: Alchemical Allocation
Spell.short_description: Gain potion’s benefits without consuming it.

Spell.name: Allfood
Spell.short_description: Turns item up to 5 lbs./level into food.

Spell.name: Alter Winds
Spell.short_description: Increase/decrease strength of natural winds.

Spell.name: Amplify Elixir
Spell.short_description: Empowers or extends the effects of any potion or elixir.

Spell.name: Ant Haul
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 1, cleric/oracle 1, druid 1, ranger 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Triples carrying capacity of a creature.

Spell.name: Aqueous Orb
Spell.spell_level: druid 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, magus 3, bloodrager 3
Spell.short_description: Creates rolling sphere of water.

Spell.name: Arcane Concordance
Spell.short_description: Grants metamagic to arcane spells.

Spell.name: Arrow Eruption
Spell.short_description: Creates duplicates of an arrow used to kill a creature in the previous round.

Spell.name: Aspect of the Bear
Spell.short_description: +2 AC and combat maneuver rolls.

Spell.name: Aspect of the Falcon
Spell.short_description: Gives bonuses on Perception and ranged attacks.

Spell.name: Aspect of the Stag
Spell.short_description: +2 AC against attacks of opportunity

Spell.name: Aspect of the Wolf
Spell.short_description: Subject gains +4 Str and Dex, and +2 bonus on trip attacks.

Spell.name: Aura of Greater Courage
Spell.short_description: Increases strength of a paladin’s aura of courage.

Spell.name: Ball Lightning
Spell.spell_level: druid 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, magus 4, bloodrager 4, shaman 4, occultist 4
Spell.short_description: Flying lightning spheres deal 3d6

Spell.name: Banish Seeming
Spell.short_description: Dispels touched illusion or a creature’s change in form.

Spell.name: Bard's Escape
Spell.short_description: You and allies escape an emergency by teleporting to safety.

Spell.name: Beguiling Gift
Spell.short_description: Subject immediately accepts an offered

Spell.name: Bestow Grace
Spell.short_description: Subject gains bonus on saving throws equal to Cha modifier.

Spell.name: Blaze of Glory
Spell.short_description: Last stand cures good creatures, hurts evil.

Spell.name: Blessing Of Fervor
Spell.short_description: Gives allies a choice of benefits.
Spell.mythic_text: Affected creatures can choose two of the spell's bonuses each round rather than one.

Spell.name: Blessing of the Salamander
