Spell.short_description: Subject gets fast healing 2, fire resistance 10, and +2 to its CMD.

Spell.name: Blood Biography
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 3, inquisitor 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, bloodrager 3, occultist 2, psychic 3, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Learn about a creature with its blood.

Spell.name: Bloodhound
Spell.short_description: Gives caster the scent special ability.

Spell.name: Bloody Claws
Spell.short_description: Causes bleed damage with natural attacks.

Spell.name: Bomber's Eye
Spell.short_description: Increases thrown weapon range; +1 attack.

Spell.name: Borrow Fortune
Spell.short_description: (Oracle only.) Retry attack or check, but do worse on next two.

Spell.name: Borrow Skill
Spell.short_description: Make a skill check using another’s ranks.

Spell.name: Bow Spirit
Spell.short_description: Summons an invisible spirit that fires your arrows for you as a swift action.

Spell.name: Brand
Spell.short_description: Creates permanent brand on target creature.

Spell.name: Brand, Greater
Spell.short_description: As brand, but brand glows when near your holy symbol.

Spell.name: Break
Spell.short_description: Gives an object the broken condition.
Spell.mythic_text: You can target up to 1 Medium or smaller object per caster level.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, target objects gain the broken condition on a successful save and are destroyed on a failed save. This doesn't affect mythic objects or objects held or carried by mythic creatures.

Spell.name: Brilliant Inspiration
Spell.short_description: Take best of two d20 rolls.

Spell.name: Bristle
Spell.short_description: Trade natural armor bonus for a bonus on attacks with natural weapons.

Spell.name: Burning Gaze
Spell.spell_level: druid 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, magus 2, bloodrager 2, shaman 2, occultist 2, mesmerist 2
Spell.short_description: Inflict 1d6 fire damage to creature.
Spell.mythic_text: You may focus your burning gaze on a creature or object as a move action instead of as a standard action. The target takes 1d8 points of fire damage for failing its save and for each round it's on fire.
Spell.augmented: Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, once during the spell's duration you can, as a full-round action, direct your burning gaze at up to one creature per caster level.

Spell.name: Burst Bonds
Spell.short_description: 1d6 damage/level (max 5d6) to restraints.

Spell.name: Cacophonous Call
Spell.short_description: Nauseates target.

Spell.name: Cacophonous Call, Mass
Spell.short_description: Nauseates multiple targets.

Spell.name: Calcific Touch
Spell.short_description: Touch attack slows target, 1d4 Dex damage.

Spell.name: Call Animal
Spell.short_description: Makes an animal come to you.
Spell.mythic_text: You can call up to one animal per 2 caster levels. Animals that answer your call have a starting attitude of friendly. Add your tier to Handle Animal checks attempted to influence these animals. You may use this spell to call magical beasts with Intelligence 1 or 2, but they can attempt Will saving throws (with a +4 bonus) to resist the spell.

Spell.name: Campfire Wall
Spell.short_description: Creates a shelter around a campfire.

Spell.name: Cast Out
Spell.short_description: Does 2d8 damage +1/level (max +15) to creature and dispels an effect.

Spell.name: Castigate
Spell.short_description: Causes target to be shaken and cower.

Spell.name: Castigate, Mass
Spell.short_description: As castigate, but affects multiple creatures.

Spell.name: Challenge Evil
Spell.short_description: Sickens creature if it refuses to fight you.

Spell.name: Chameleon Stride
Spell.short_description: Gives a +4 bonus on Stealth checks and concealment.

Spell.name: Clashing Rocks
Spell.short_description: 20d6 damage to target creature.

Spell.name: Cleanse
Spell.short_description: As heal, but only cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +25).

Spell.name: Cloak of Dreams
Spell.spell_level: bard 5, sorcerer/wizard 6, witch 6, shaman 7, occultist 6, psychic 6, mesmerist 5
Spell.short_description: Living creatures within 5 ft. fall asleep.

Spell.name: Cloak of Shade
Spell.short_description: Reduces effects of sun exposure and heat.

Spell.name: Cloak of Winds
Spell.spell_level: druid 3, ranger 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, magus 3, bloodrager 3, occultist 3, spiritualist 3
Spell.short_description: Creates screen of strong wind around you.

Spell.name: Confess
Spell.short_description: Creature answers question truthfully or takes 1d6 damage/two levels (max 5d6).

Spell.name: Contagious Flame
Spell.short_description: Scorching rays cause 4d6 fire damage, then move on to new targets.

Spell.name: Coordinated Effort
Spell.short_description: Grants a teamwork feat you have.

Spell.name: Corruption Resistance
Spell.short_description: Protects creature against damage from alignment-based attacks.

Spell.name: Coward's Lament
Spell.short_description: If subject doesn’t attack you it receives a penalty.

Spell.name: Crafter's Curse
Spell.short_description: Subject takes –5 on Craft skill checks.

Spell.name: Crafter's Fortune
Spell.short_description: Subject gains +5 on next Craft check.

Spell.name: Create Pit
Spell.short_description: Creates an extradimensional pit.

Spell.name: Create Treasure Map
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, druid 3, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Creates treasure map out of a creature’s corpse.

Spell.name: Cup Of Dust
Spell.short_description: Causes a creature to become dehydrated.
Spell.mythic_text: On a failed save, the target immediately takes 1d6 points of nonlethal damage per tier. Add your tier to the DC of any further Constitution checks the target attempts to resist dehydration as part of this spell's effects. While the curse is in effect, the target gains no benefit from any spell, effect, or item that requires drinking, such as potions and elixirs (though these are still used up when the target drinks them).

Spell.name: Dancing Lantern
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, cleric/oracle 1, ranger 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, shaman 1
Spell.short_description: Animates a lantern that follows you.

Spell.name: Deadly Finale
Spell.short_description: Deals 2d8 damage to multiple targets.

Spell.name: Deafening Song Bolt
Spell.short_description: Blast of song deals 3d10 damage and deafens targets.

Spell.name: Defile Armor
Spell.short_description: As sanctify armor, but gain DR 5/good when using judgment or smite.
Spell.mythic_text: You gain DR 5/good while wearing the target armor. While using your judgment or smite ability, this improves to DR 10/good.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, while you use your judgment or smite, add half your tier to your AC as a profane bonus.

Spell.name: Deflection
Spell.short_description: Attacks that miss are redirected back to the source of the attack.

Spell.name: Delayed Consumption
Spell.short_description: Extract doesn’t come into effect until you want it to.

Spell.name: Denounce
Spell.short_description: Worsens attitudes toward target creature.

Spell.name: Detect Aberration
Spell.short_description: Reveals presence of aberrations.

Spell.name: Detonate
Spell.short_description: Inflicts 1d8/level energy damage to all creatures within 15 ft.

Spell.name: Devolution
Spell.short_description: Target eidolon temporarily loses 1 evolution +1/five levels.
Spell.mythic_text: The saving throw changes to Will (partial). If it succeeds at its save, the eidolon loses one evolution, chosen at random.

Spell.name: Discordant Blast
Spell.short_description: 3d6 sonic damage in 10-ft. burst or 30-ft.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 5d6 points of sonic damage, and you gain a +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks to the bull rush opponents. The spell can penetrate non-mythic magical silence and dispels any non-mythic silence effect of 4th level or lower.

Spell.name: Divine Transfer
Spell.short_description: Transfer hit points and give DR/evil to target creature.

Spell.name: Divine Vessel
Spell.short_description: (Oracle only.) Change into a huge, otherworldly creature.

Spell.name: Draconic Reservoir
Spell.duration: 10 minutes/level or until discharged; see text
Spell.short_description: Subject can absorb energy damage and enhance melee attacks with it.
Spell.mythic_text: The amount of energy damage the spell absorbs increases to 10 points per caster level (maximum 100 points). The energy damage from the weapons improves as if using a corrosive burst, flaming burst, icy burst, or shocking burst weapon.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, spending a swift action applies the energy damage to any number of creatures the target hits this round, not just the first.

Spell.name: Dragon's Breath
Spell.short_description: Gives you a dragon’s breath weapon.
Spell.mythic_text: The spell's duration changes to 1 minute/level or until discharged. You can use the breath weapon up to three times during this duration. On the round you cast the spell, using the breath weapon is a free action; later uses require a standard action. You must wait 1d4 rounds between each use of the breath weapon. All uses for a particular casting have the same range, area, and energy type. You can have only one dragon's breath spell in effect at a time; casting a new one ends the previous one.

Spell.name: Dust Of Twilight
Spell.short_description: Black particles extinguish light sources.
Spell.mythic_text: A creature that fails its Fortitude save against the spell must also succeed at a Will save at the same DC or fall asleep (as the sleep spell). Creatures that succeed at their saves are merely drowsy (as the lullaby spell).
Spell.augmented: Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, add half your tier to the level of light spells mythic dust of twilight dispels.

Spell.name: Eagle Eye
Spell.short_description: Creates a magical sensor high above you.

Spell.name: Elemental Aura
Spell.short_description: Creates an aura of energy around you.

Spell.name: Elemental Speech
Spell.short_description: Enables you to speak to elementals and some creatures.

Spell.name: Elemental Touch
Spell.short_description: Gain energy damage touch attack.

Spell.name: Elude Time
Spell.short_description: Puts you in temporary suspended animation.

Spell.name: Enemy Hammer
Spell.short_description: Allows you to telekinetically use a creature as a weapon.

Spell.name: Enter Image
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, occultist 2, psychic 3, mesmerist 2, medium 3
Spell.short_description: Transfers your consciousness to an object bearing your likeness.

Spell.name: Euphoric Tranquility
Spell.spell_level: bard 6, cleric/oracle 8, druid 8, sorcerer/wizard 8, psychic 8, mesmerist 6
Spell.short_description: Makes a single creature peaceful and friendly.

Spell.name: Evolution Surge, Lesser
Spell.short_description: Grants eidolon an evolution with 2 evolution points.

Spell.name: Evolution Surge
Spell.short_description: Grants eidolon an evolution with 4 evolution points.

Spell.name: Evolution Surge, Greater
Spell.short_description: Grants eidolon two evolutions with a total of 6 evolution points.

Spell.name: Expeditious Excavation
Spell.short_description: Moves 5-ft. cubes of earth.

Spell.name: Expend
Spell.short_description: Wastes creatures’ limited use magical ability.

Spell.name: Feast Of Ashes
Spell.short_description: A target starves with an insatiable hunger.
Spell.mythic_text: On a failed save, the target immediately takes 1d6 points of nonlethal damage per tier. Add your tier to the DC of any further Constitution checks the target attempts to resist the effects of starvation as part of this spell's effects. While the curse is in effect, the target gains no benefit from any spell, effect, or item that requires eating, such as the food from a heroes' feast spell (though the food is still used up when the target eats it).

Spell.name: Feather Step
Spell.short_description: Subject ignores adverse movement effects in difficult terrain.

Spell.name: Feather Step, Mass
Spell.short_description: As feather step, but multiple creatures.

Spell.name: Fester
Spell.short_description: Gives subject SR 12 + your level vs. healing effects.

Spell.name: Fester, Mass
Spell.short_description: As fester, but affecting multiple targets.

Spell.name: Fiery Body
Spell.short_description: You gain various fire-related powers.

Spell.name: Fire Breath
Spell.duration: 1 round/level or until discharged; see text
Spell.short_description: Exhale a cone of flame at will.

Spell.name: Fire of Entanglement
Spell.short_description: Your ability to smite evil also entangles your foe.

Spell.name: Fire of Judgment
Spell.short_description: Smited creature takes damage when it attacks.

Spell.name: Fire of Vengeance
Spell.short_description: Smited creature takes 3d8 damage.

Spell.name: Fire Snake
Spell.short_description: Creates a serpentine path of fire 5 ft. long/level that deals 1d6 fire damage/level.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 1d10 points of damage per level (maximum 15d10). Any creature that fails its saving throw against the spell is grappled by a snake made of fire that lasts for 1 round per caster level. The snake can be dispelled, but not attacked. A grappled creature takes 1d10 points of fire damage on your turn each round. The snake's CMB is equal to your caster level plus your tier, and its CMD is equal to its CMB + 10.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the maximum damage increases to 20d10, and any creature that fails its saving throw against the spell is pinned instead of grappled.

Spell.name: Firebrand
Spell.short_description: Allies gain flaming weapons, immunity to your fire spells, and a one-use ray of fire attack.

Spell.name: Firefall
Spell.short_description: Causes fire to burst up, dealing 2d6 fire damage.

Spell.name: Flames Of The Faithful
Spell.short_description: Gives weapon flaming property.
Spell.mythic_text: The fire damage dealt by this spell bypasses fire resistance andfire immunity. On a successful critical hit, the target catches onfire (Core Rulebook 444).

Spell.name: Flare Burst
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, druid 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, magus 1, bloodrager 1, psychic 1
Spell.short_description: As flare, but on all creatures within 10 ft.

Spell.name: Fluid Form
Spell.short_description: Gain DR 10/slashing, increases reach 10 ft.,

Spell.name: Fly, Mass
Spell.short_description: One creature/level gains ability to fly.

Spell.name: Foe to Friend
Spell.short_description: Redirect an enemy creature's attack.

Spell.name: Follow Aura
Spell.short_description: Gain ability to follow the trail of the aura of an alignment.

Spell.name: Fool's Forbiddance
Spell.short_description: Confuses enemies who come within a magical emanation centered on you.

Spell.name: Forced Repentance
Spell.short_description: Target falls prone and confesses all of its sins.

Spell.name: Frozen Note
Spell.short_description: Paralyzes creatures listening to your song.

Spell.name: Gallant Inspiration
Spell.short_description: +2d4 bonus on failed attack roll or skill check.

Spell.name: Getaway
Spell.spell_level: bard 6, sorcerer/wizard 6, occultist 6, psychic 6, mesmerist 6, spiritualist 6
Spell.short_description: Teleports a group of predetermined allies and creatures to a predetermined location.

Spell.name: Geyser
Spell.short_description: Creates a geyser of boiling water.

Spell.name: Ghostbane Dirge
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, inquisitor 2, paladin 1, shaman 2, occultist 2
Spell.short_description: Incorporeal creature takes half damage from nonmagical weapons.

Spell.name: Ghostbane Dirge, Mass
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, cleric/oracle 5, inquisitor 5, paladin 3, shaman 5, occultist 5
Spell.short_description: As ghostbane dirge, but affects multiple creatures.

Spell.name: Glide
Spell.spell_level: druid 2, ranger 1, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2, witch 2, shaman 2, occultist 2, psychic 2
Spell.short_description: No fall damage, move 60 ft./round while falling.

Spell.name: Grace
Spell.short_description: Movement doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity.

Spell.name: Gravity Bow
Spell.short_description: Arrows do damage as though one size category bigger.

Spell.name: Grove of Respite
Spell.short_description: Creates trees and a small spring.

Spell.name: Guiding Star
Spell.short_description: Know approximate distance from where you cast this spell.

Spell.name: Heroic Finale
Spell.short_description: Subject within range of your bardic performance can take an action.

Spell.name: Hero's Defiance
Spell.short_description: Allows the use of lay on hands while falling unconscious.

Spell.name: Hidden Speech
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, inquisitor 3, witch 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Gain +10 on Bluff to send secret messages.

Spell.name: Hide Campsite
Spell.short_description: Hides all traces of your campsite.

Spell.name: Holy Whisper
Spell.short_description: Whisper sickens evil creatures, gives good creatures bonuses.

Spell.name: Honeyed Tongue
Spell.short_description: Roll 2 dice when using Diplomacy, take higher roll.

Spell.name: Hungry Pit
Spell.short_description: As create pit, but dealing 4d6 damage to those in it as it closes.

Spell.name: Hydraulic Push
Spell.short_description: Wave of water bull rushes an enemy.
Spell.mythic_text: The water is boiling hot or freezing cold, dealing 1d6 points of fire or cold damage per 2 caster levels. Add your tier to your CMB for the spell.

Spell.name: Hydraulic Torrent
Spell.short_description: Creates torrent of water that bull rushes any creature in its path.
Spell.mythic_text: The water is boiling hot or freezing cold, dealing 1d6 points of fire or cold damage per 2 caster levels. Add your tier to your CMB for the spell and on the Strength check to destroy immovable targets.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell can extinguish magical fires as if using a targeted dispel magic. Freezing cold water hardens into ice on the ground (Core Rulebook 442), lasting as long as prevailing conditions allow. Boiling hot water turns into steam, creating an area of concealing mist (equivalent to obscuring mist) that fills the affected squares and all squares adjacent to the line of the spell.

Spell.name: Ill Omen
Spell.short_description: Target rolls twice for checks and attacks and uses worst roll.
Spell.mythic_text: For the target's unlucky d20 rolls, it must roll three times and take the lowest result. Spending a move action to utter a prayer or good luck charm allows the target to roll twice instead of three times.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (4th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you afflict the target with especially foul luck. Any natural 20 it rolls counts as a natural 1 instead.

Spell.name: Innocence
Spell.short_description: Gain +10 on Bluff checks to seem innocent.

Spell.name: Instant Armor
Spell.short_description: Summon armor temporarily replacing your current attire.

Spell.name: Instant Enemy
Spell.short_description: Target is treated as a favored enemy type of your choice.

Spell.name: Invigorate
Spell.short_description: Temporarily relieves fatigue or exhaustion.

Spell.name: Invigorate, Mass
Spell.short_description: As invigorate, but multiple creatures.

Spell.name: Jester's Jaunt
Spell.short_description: Teleport target within 30 ft. of itself.

Spell.name: Keen Senses
Spell.short_description: Gain +2 Perception and low-light vision.

Spell.name: King's Castle
Spell.short_description: Instantly switch places with a single ally.

Spell.name: Knight's Calling
Spell.short_description: Forces target to move toward you and fight you.

Spell.name: Lead Blades
Spell.short_description: Melee weapons damage as if one size bigger.

Spell.name: Life Bubble
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 5, druid 4, ranger 3, sorcerer/wizard 5, occultist 4, psychic 5
Spell.short_description: Protects from environmental effects.

Spell.name: Light Lance
Spell.short_description: Creates a soaring beacon of light.

Spell.name: Lily Pad Stride
Spell.short_description: Walk across water on moving lily pads.

Spell.name: Lockjaw
Spell.short_description: Creature gains grab ability with natural attack.

Spell.name: Marks Of Forbiddance
Spell.short_description: Makes 2 creatures pass Will saves in order to attack each other.

Spell.name: Mask Dweomer
Spell.short_description: Hides presence of a spell from detect magic.

Spell.name: Memory Lapse
Spell.short_description: Subject forgets events back to last turn.

Spell.name: Moonstruck
Spell.short_description: Subject is enraged and confused.

Spell.name: Nap Stack
Spell.short_description: Subjects only need 2 hours for a night’s sleep, and can sleep even longer for more benefits.

Spell.name: Natural Rhythm
Spell.short_description: +1 on damage rolls with each hit (max +5).

Spell.name: Nature's Exile
Spell.short_description: Gives subject –10 on Survival checks.

Spell.name: Negate Aroma
Spell.short_description: Subject cannot be tracked by scent.

Spell.name: Oath Of Peace
Spell.short_description: Grants +5 AC and DR 10/evil, can’t attack.
Spell.mythic_text: You don't provoke attacks of opportunity when you attempt Heal checks, cast targeted spells with the harmless descriptor, or use positive energy effects to heal living creatures.

Spell.name: Oracle's Burden
Spell.short_description: (Oracle only.) Creature is affected by negative oracle's curse effects.

Spell.name: Pain Strike
Spell.short_description: Inflicts 1d6 nonlethal damage 1 round/level.

Spell.name: Pain Strike, Mass
Spell.short_description: As pain, but affects multiple creatures.

Spell.name: Paladin's Sacrifice
Spell.short_description: Take the damage and effects for another creature.

Spell.name: Phantasmal Revenge
Spell.short_description: Ghost from corpse hunts killer.

Spell.name: Phantasmal Web
Spell.short_description: Catches subjects in illusory web.

Spell.name: Pied Piping
Spell.short_description: Compel similar creatures to follow you.

Spell.name: Pillar Of Life
Spell.short_description: Created pillar heals 2d8 + 1/level (max +20).
Spell.mythic_text: The damage healed increases to 3d8 points of damage + 1 point per caster level (maximum +20). The damage dealt to undead increases to 1d8 points of damage per caster level (maximum 10d8), or 2d6 points of damage per caster level for undead vulnerable to bright light (maximum 20d6). If a dead creature is brought into the pillar's square and that creature could be revived by breath of life, the pillar of life ends and the creature returns to life as per breath of life.

Spell.name: Planar Adaptation
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 5, cleric/oracle 4, sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner/unchained summoner 5, occultist 4, psychic 4, spiritualist 5, medium 4
Spell.short_description: Resist harmful effects of other plane.

Spell.name: Planar Adaptation, Mass
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 6, sorcerer/wizard 7, summoner/unchained summoner 6, occultist 6, psychic 6
Spell.short_description: As planar adaptation, but affects multiple creatures.

Spell.name: Pox Pustules
Spell.short_description: Subject is sickened and has –4 Dex.
Spell.mythic_text: The Dexterity penalty increases to -6. The target takes 1 point of bleed damage each round. If the target spends a move action scratching, increase its bleed damage each round by 1. If the bleeding is stopped, scratching causes it to start again at 1 point of bleed per round.

Spell.name: Protective Spirit
Spell.short_description: Protects from attacks of opportunity.

Spell.name: Purging Finale
Spell.short_description: Removes one negative effect.

Spell.name: Purified Calling
Spell.short_description: Eidolon summoned is fully healed.

Spell.name: Putrefy Food and Drink
Spell.short_description: Makes food and water inedible.

Spell.name: Rally Point
Spell.short_description: Square gives good creatures bonuses.

Spell.name: Rebuke
Spell.short_description: Foes take 1d8 damage/two caster levels (max 5d8).

Spell.name: Rampart
Spell.short_description: Creates 5-ft.-thick earthen barrier.

Spell.name: Rejuvenate Eidolon, Lesser
Spell.short_description: Eidolon cured 1d10 damage +1/level (max +5).

Spell.name: Rejuvenate Eidolon
Spell.short_description: As lesser rejuvenate eidolon, but cures 3d10 damage +1/level (max +10).

Spell.name: Rejuvenate Eidolon, Greater
Spell.short_description: As lesser rejuvenate eidolon, but cures 5d10 damage +1/level (max +20).

Spell.name: Resounding Blow
Spell.short_description: Melee attack deals 1d6 more damage.

Spell.name: Rest Eternal
Spell.short_description: Dead creature cannot be revived.

Spell.name: Restful Sleep
Spell.short_description: Gain more hit points while sleeping.

Spell.name: Resurgent Transformation
Spell.duration: 1 hour/level or until triggered, then 1 round/level
Spell.short_description: Gain second wind when close to death.

Spell.name: Retribution
Spell.short_description: Recent attacker is aff licted with penalties.

Spell.name: Reviving Finale
Spell.short_description: Allies cured 2d6 damage.

Spell.name: Righteous Vigor
Spell.short_description: Boosts attack bonus with each hit.

Spell.name: River of Wind
Spell.short_description: Creates wind that causes nonlethal damage

Spell.name: Sacred Bond
Spell.short_description: Cast touch healing spells from a distance.
Spell.mythic_text: The range at which you and the target can cast conjuration (healing) spells on each other increases to medium (100 feet + 10 feet per caster level). When you or the target uses the sacred bond to cast a healing spell on the other, the caster also heals a number of hit points equal to the minimum amount the spell can heal.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, casting a healing spell through the link heals the caster the normal amount instead of the minimum amount. You and the target can use the link to heal each other with targeted healing abilities such as lay on hands. Unlike with healing spells, a character using a healing ability in this way doesn't heal herself.

Spell.name: Sacrificial Oath
Spell.short_description: Take damage for an ally for many rounds.

Spell.name: Saddle Surge
Spell.short_description: Bonus damage for moving on mount.

Spell.name: Sanctify Armor
Spell.short_description: +1 AC/four levels (max +5).
Spell.mythic_text: You gain DR 5/evil while wearing the target armor. While you're using your judgment or smite ability, this improves to DR 10/evil.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, when you use judgment or smite, add half your tier to your AC as a sacred bonus.

Spell.name: Saving Finale
Spell.short_description: Subject rerolls failed saving throw.
Spell.mythic_text: Add your tier as a bonus on the saving throw reroll.

Spell.name: Scent Trail
Spell.short_description: Leave trail for allies to follow.

Spell.name: Screech
Spell.short_description: Foes provoke attacks of opportunity.

Spell.name: Sculpt Corpse
Spell.short_description: Makes corpse look like another creature.

Spell.name: Seamantle
Spell.short_description: Sheathes you in protective water.

Spell.name: Seek Thoughts
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 3, bard 3, inquisitor 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, witch 3, occultist 3, psychic 2, mesmerist 3, spiritualist 3, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Detects thinking creatures’ thoughts.

Spell.name: Share Language
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, occultist 2, psychic 1, mesmerist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Subject understands chosen language.

Spell.name: Shadow Projection
Spell.short_description: Temporarily become a shadow.

Spell.name: Share Senses
Spell.short_description: See/hear/smell what your familiar is.

Spell.name: Shifting Sand
Spell.short_description: Creates difficult terrain and erases tracks;

Spell.name: Shared Wrath
Spell.short_description: As wrath, but affects multiple creatures.

Spell.name: Sift
Spell.short_description: See area as though examining it.

Spell.name: Sirocco
Spell.short_description: Hot wind does 4d6 damage, fatigues those damaged, and knocks creatures prone.

Spell.name: Sleepwalk
Spell.short_description: Causes creature to move while asleep.

Spell.name: Slipstream
Spell.short_description: Wave boosts creature’s speed.

Spell.name: Snake Staff
Spell.short_description: Transforms wood into snakes to fight for you.

Spell.name: Solid Note
Spell.short_description: Creates tangible music note.

Spell.name: Spark
Spell.spell_level: bard 0, cleric/oracle 0, druid 0, sorcerer/wizard 0, witch 0, magus 0, occultist 0
Spell.short_description: Ignites flammable objects.

Spell.name: Spiked Pit
Spell.short_description: As create pit, but filled with spikes.

Spell.name: Spiritual Ally
Spell.short_description: Creates a divine ally to aid you.

Spell.name: Spite
Spell.short_description: Inflict touch spell upon creature that attacks you.

Spell.name: Stay the Hand
Spell.duration: 1/round per level and special; see text
Spell.short_description: Subject cannot attack with melee weapon.

Spell.name: Stone Call
Spell.short_description: 2d6 damage to all creatures in area.

Spell.name: Stone Fist
Spell.short_description: Your unarmed strikes are lethal.

Spell.name: Stormbolts
Spell.short_description: 1d8 damage/level (max 20d8) to targets.

Spell.name: Strong Jaw
Spell.short_description: Natural attacks damage as two sizes bigger.

Spell.name: Stumble Gap
Spell.short_description: Small hole trips creatures.

Spell.name: Stunning Finale
Spell.short_description: Stuns 3 creatures for 1 round.

Spell.name: Suffocation
Spell.short_description: Target quickly suffocates to death.

Spell.name: Suffocation, Mass
Spell.short_description: One creature/level suffocates to death.

Spell.name: Summon Eidolon
Spell.short_description: Instantly summons your eidolon for duration of spell.

Spell.name: Swarm Skin
Spell.short_description: Turns your body into a swarm that can attack.

Spell.name: Thorn Body
Spell.short_description: Your attackers take 1d6 +1 damage/level.

Spell.name: Threefold Aspect
Spell.short_description: Appear older or younger.

Spell.name: Thundering Drums
Spell.short_description: 1d8 damage/level and knocked prone.

Spell.name: Timely Inspiration
Spell.short_description: Gives bonus on failed check/attack.

Spell.name: Tireless Pursuit
Spell.short_description: Ignore fatigue while hustling.

Spell.name: Tireless Pursuers
Spell.short_description: As tireless pursuit, but affects multiple creatures.

Spell.name: Touch of Gracelessness
Spell.short_description: Subject loses 1d6 + 1 Dex/two levels and is prone to falling down.

Spell.name: Touch of the Sea
Spell.short_description: Swim speed becomes 30 ft.

Spell.name: Transmogrify
Spell.short_description: Change your eidolon's evolutions.

Spell.name: Transmute Potion to Poison
Spell.short_description: Spit poison onto weapon

Spell.name: Treasure Stitching
Spell.short_description: Objects on cloth become embroidered.

Spell.name: True Form
Spell.short_description: Removes polymorph effects.
Spell.mythic_text: The spell's target changes to up to one creature per 2 caster levels. If a target is a creature that has the ability to change shape between a specific set of forms (such as a barghest or lycanthrope), you may choose which form the creature takes. To force such a creature into a form, you must have either seen it in that form or succeeded at an appropriate Knowledge check to know the creature has the ability to take that form.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend three uses of mythic power, the spell creates an area affecting all shapechanging creatures. The range changes to 30 feet and the spell affects all creatures in a 30-foot radius around you. Each creature must attempt a saving throw against the spell every round it remains in the area.

Spell.name: Tsunami
Spell.short_description: Huge wave damages and sweeps up all in its path.
Spell.mythic_text: The wave increases to 20 feet wide per caster level and 3 feet tall per caster level. The damage dealt to those struck by the wave increases to 12d6 points of bludgeoning damage. Add your tier to the wave's special combat maneuver check. The damage dealt to those that fail to escape the wave increases to 6d8 points of bludgeoning damage.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (5th): If you expend three uses of mythic power, you create a truly monstrous wave. The wave increases to 20 feet deep, 20 feet wide per caster level, and 5 feet tall per caster level. The duration of the effect increases to 10 rounds, and the speed of the wave increases to 120 feet per round on the surface of the water and 60 feet per round on land or underwater.

Spell.name: Twilight Knife
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, bloodrager 3, occultist 3, psychic 3, spiritualist 3
Spell.short_description: Floating knife attacks with you.

Spell.name: Twin Form
Spell.short_description: Creates controllable duplicate of you.

Spell.name: Unfetter
Spell.short_description: Remove distance restriction on eidolon.

Spell.name: Universal Formula
Spell.short_description: Acts as any extract 3rd level or lower.

Spell.name: Unwilling Shield
Spell.spell_level: bard 5, inquisitor 5, sorcerer/wizard 6, witch 6, occultist 5, psychic 6, mesmerist 5, spiritualist 6
Spell.short_description: Subject shares wounds you receive.

Spell.name: Unwitting Ally
Spell.short_description: Subject is considered ally for 1 round.

Spell.name: Vanish
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, magus 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1
Spell.short_description: As invisibility for 1 round/level (5 max).

Spell.name: Veil of Positive Energy
Spell.short_description: +2 AC, +2 on saves vs. undead.

Spell.name: Venomous Bolt
Spell.short_description: Arrow or bolt poisons target.

Spell.name: Versatile Weapon
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, magus 3, bloodrager 3, occultist 2, psychic 3
Spell.short_description: Weapon bypasses some DR.

Spell.name: Vomit Swarm
Spell.short_description: Produces a spider swarm that fights for you.

Spell.name: Vortex
Spell.short_description: Creates a whirlpool in water.

Spell.name: Wake of Light
Spell.short_description: Magical trail aids good creatures, hinders evil ones.

Spell.name: Wall of Lava
Spell.short_description: Wall damages foes that try to enter, periodically launches lava at nearby targets.

Spell.name: Wall of Suppression
Spell.short_description: Creates wall that disables magic.

Spell.name: Wandering Star Motes
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, witch 4, shaman 4, occultist 4, psychic 4
Spell.short_description: Outlines subject and produces light as a sunrod.

Spell.name: Ward the Faithful
Spell.short_description: Creatures of same faith gain bonuses to AC and on saving throws.

Spell.name: Weapon of Awe
Spell.short_description: Weapon gets +2 on damage rolls.

Spell.name: Winds of Vengeance
Spell.short_description: Grants flight; attack with wind.

Spell.name: World Wave
Spell.short_description: Earth moves you across distances.

Spell.name: Wrath
Spell.short_description: +1 attack and damage against target creature.

Spell.name: Wrathful Mantle
Spell.short_description: Subject shines and gets +1/four levels on all saves.

Spell.name: Hunter's Eye
Spell.short_description: +20 on Perception checks to locate a target.

Spell.name: Hunter's Howl
Spell.short_description: Treat enemies as favored for 1 round/level.

Spell.name: Perceive Cues
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 2, inquisitor 2, ranger 2, witch 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2
Spell.short_description: +5 Perception and Sense Motive 10 min./level.

Spell.name: Residual Tracking
Spell.short_description: Tell creature's appearance by footprint.

Spell.name: Blessing of Courage and Life
Spell.short_description: Grants a +2 bonus on saves vs. fear and death.

Spell.name: Gorum's Armor
Spell.mythic_text: The damage to attackers increases to 1d4 points of piercingdamage and affects creatures that attack the wearer with amelee weapon, an unarmed strike, or a natural weapon. Meleeweapons with reach do not endanger a creature in this way.If you're wearing the armor and are taking bleed damage,the spikes lengthen and grow wicked barbs-this increases theirdamage against foes that strike you to 1d6 + 1/2 your caster level(maximum +5), and the spikes deal 1 point of bleed damage toany foe damaged by them. When your bleeding stops, the spikesimmediately return to their normal size and any bleed effectscaused by the armor end.

Spell.name: Harrowing
Spell.mythic_text: The bonuses and penalties associated with your reading aredoubled, resulting in a +4 luck bonus if the card's and target'salignment are identical, a -2 penalty if the alignments areopposite, and a +2 luck bonus for any other alignment. You canuse each bonus twice-once at this doubled value, the secondtime at the normal value (+2 or +1). You must use a given card'sdoubled bonus before you can use its lower bonus. Once youhave used both bonuses, or when the spell's duration ends, thespell ends and any penalties are removed.A mythic harrowing cast on the target of a non-mythicharrowing supersedes and negates the harrowing effect. Ifa creature is subjected to a second mythic harrowing while aprevious mythic harrowing is still in effect, the new mythicharrowing automatically fails.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic powerduring the reading, you may discard one card of your choiceand draw one new card in its place, replacing the effects ofthe chosen card with the effects of the newly drawn card. Youmust keep this new card. You can use each bonus twice, bothat the doubled values. Once you have used both bonuses,or when the spell's duration ends, the spell ends and anypenalties are removed.

Spell.name: Infernal Healing
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, magus 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, witch 1

Spell.name: Infernal Healing, Greater
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 4, magus 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner/unchained summoner 4, witch 4

Spell.name: Lover's Vengeance
Spell.duration: up to 1 day/level (D) or until discharged

Spell.name: Shield Of The Dawnflower
Spell.mythic_text: The disk of sunlight protects you as a buckler with a +1enhancement bonus per 4 caster levels (maximum +5).You can make a melee touch attack with your shield of theDawnflower in place of a normal attack to deal its fire damageto a creature. Creatures taking damage from your shield catch onfire (Reflex negates); the save DC to extinguish the fire is equalto the DC of the spell.

Spell.name: Waters Of Lamashtu
Spell.mythic_text: When used as unholy water, mythic waters of Lamashtu dealtwice as much damage and prevent the creature from regaininghit points from fast healing or regeneration for 1d4 rounds(meaning the creature can be killed normally). The abilitydamage from the waters increases to 2d4, and a creatureimbibing or anointed by the waters is nauseated for 1d4 roundsif it fails its saving throw. The long-term effects of drinkingmythic waters of Lamashtu happen more quickly, requiring onlyregular exposure over weeks instead of massive quantities formonths, and warp the consuming creature more extensively (atthe GM's discretion). Monstrosities created by mythic waters ofLamashtu can breed with members of their original species andpass on such mutations to their offspring.

Spell.name: Acidic Spray
Spell.short_description: 1d6/level acid damage plus 1 round of acid.

Spell.name: Acute Senses
Spell.short_description: Subject gains a bonus on Perception checks.

Spell.name: Age Resistance, Lesser
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 3, druid 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, witch 4, occultist 3, psychic 4
Spell.short_description: Ignore penalties from middle age.

Spell.name: Age Resistance, Greater
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 5, druid 7, sorcerer/wizard 7, witch 7, occultist 5, psychic 7
Spell.short_description: Ignore penalties from venerable age.

Spell.name: Age Resistance
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 4, druid 6, sorcerer/wizard 6, witch 6, occultist 4, psychic 6
Spell.short_description: Ignore penalties from old age.

Spell.name: Allegro
Spell.short_description: Gain haste while maintaining bardic performance.

Spell.name: Animate Dead, Lesser
Spell.short_description: Create one skeleton or zombie.

Spell.name: Anthropomorphic Animal
Spell.short_description: Animal becomes bipedal.

Spell.name: Anticipate Peril
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 1, bard 1, ranger 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1, spiritualist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Target gains a bonus on one initiative check.
Spell.mythic_text: Add your tier to the spell's initiative bonus and the maximum initiative bonus the spell can grant.

Spell.name: Arboreal Hammer
Spell.short_description: Tree branches attack opponents.
Spell.mythic_text: You animate two branches instead of one, allowing the tree to attack twice per round. Add your tier to your caster level when determining the tree's Strength score. A creature struck by both slam attacks in the same round must succeed at a Fortitude save against the spell's DC or be staggered for 1 round.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (7th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the tree attempts three slam attacks per round and its slams bypass all damage reduction. A creature struck by all three slam attacks in the same round is stunned for 1 round and staggered for 1d4 rounds after the stun ends. A successful Fortitude save negates the stun and reduces the duration of being staggered by half.

Spell.name: Arcana Theft
Spell.short_description: Targeted dispel transfers an effect to you.

Spell.name: Archon's Aura
Spell.short_description: Aura penalizes enemy attacks and AC.

Spell.name: Arrow of Law
Spell.short_description: Harm and possibly daze chaotic creatures.

Spell.name: Ash Storm
Spell.short_description: Hamper vision and movement.

Spell.name: Astral Projection, Lesser
Spell.short_description: Limited astral travel.

Spell.name: Atavism
Spell.short_description: Animal gains advanced creature simple template.

Spell.name: Atavism, Mass
Spell.short_description: One animal/level gains advanced template.

Spell.name: Aura of Doom
Spell.short_description: Creatures in your aura become shaken.

Spell.name: Badger's Ferocity
Spell.short_description: Weapons are keen while you concentrate.

Spell.name: Battlemind Link
Spell.spell_level: inquisitor 4, sorcerer/wizard 6, occultist 5, psychic 6, mesmerist 4, medium 4
Spell.short_description: You and an ally gain attack and AC bonuses.

Spell.name: Bestow Grace of the Champion
Spell.short_description: Target gains paladin abilities for 1 round/level.

Spell.name: Blade of Bright Victory
Spell.short_description: Bonded weapon gains ghost touch.

Spell.name: Blade of Dark Triumph
Spell.short_description: Bonded weapon gains ghost touch.

Spell.name: Blessing of the Mole
Spell.short_description: 1 ally/level gains darkvision and a +2 Stealth bonus.

Spell.name: Blood Crow Strike
Spell.short_description: Unarmed strikes create crows that deal fire and negative energy damage.
Spell.mythic_text: Unarmed strikes attempted with this spell are treated as if you had the Improved Critical (unarmed strike) feat. Use your tier plus your monk level (if any) when determining your unarmed strike damage for this spell. Fire damage from this spell bypasses fire resistance.

Spell.name: Blood Mist
Spell.short_description: Mist causes Wisdom damage and rage.

Spell.name: Blood Transcription
Spell.short_description: Learn a spell from the target's blood.

Spell.name: Boiling Blood
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, bloodrager 2, psychic 2
Spell.short_description: Targets take fire damage; orcs get +2 Strength.
Spell.mythic_text: A target that fails its save takes 1d3 points of fire damage per round. If a target has the orc subtype, it also gains fire resistance 5. Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, you can affect allies as though they had the orc subtype.

Spell.name: Bungle
Spell.short_description: Target takes a –20 penalty on its next attack roll or check.

Spell.name: Burrow
Spell.short_description: Target gains a burrow speed of 15.
Spell.mythic_text: The target can breathe underground while burrowing. If you're 3rd tier, the burrow speed increases to 20 feet through sand, soil, or gravel, and to 10 feet through stone. At 6th tier, these speeds increase to 30 feet and 15 feet respectively. At 9th tier, these speeds increase to 40 feet and 20 feet.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the burrowing creature may leave behind an open tunnel with a diameter equal to half its space. When the spell's effect ends, this tunnel closes up immediately.

Spell.name: Burst of Nettles
Spell.short_description: Burst deals 3d6 damage and 1d6 acid.

Spell.name: Cackling Skull
Spell.short_description: Skull acts as magic mouth, listeners are shaken.

Spell.name: Call Construct
Spell.short_description: Summon your construct to you.

Spell.name: Cape Of Wasps
Spell.short_description: Wasp swarm defends or carries you.
Spell.mythic_text: The wasp swarm fills a 15-foot-by-15-foot space centered on you (or on 1 of your squares, if your space is larger than 1 square). Creatures in the area of the swarm are affected by it normally (including the swarm's distraction ability). Add your tier to the swarm's distraction DC. When you use the swarm to fly, it fills only your space, your fly speed is 30 feet (average maneuverability), and the swarm still provides partial concealment against ranged attacks.

Spell.name: Caustic Eruption
Spell.short_description: Burst deals 1d6 acid/level and lingers.

Spell.name: Chord Of Shards
Spell.short_description: Performance deals 2d6 piercing damage.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 2d8 points of piercing damage and bypasses all damage reduction. Any creature damaged by the shards takes 1d8 points of sonic damage.

Spell.name: Circle Of Clarity
Spell.short_description: Emanation hampers illusions and stealth.

Spell.name: Cold Ice Strike
Spell.short_description: Cone of ice slivers deals 1d6 cold/level.

Spell.name: Compassionate Ally
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Target is compelled to help injured ally.

Spell.name: Conjure Black Pudding
Spell.short_description: Summon a black pudding.
Spell.mythic_text: The black pudding has fast healing equal to your tier, as do any puddings that split off from it. The black puddings from this spell never attack you, though they're otherwise uncontrolled and might attack your allies if there are no other obvious opponents.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the pudding gains the savage mythic template (see page 224). Puddings that split off from the giant pudding don't gain the template.

Spell.name: Contagion, Greater
Spell.short_description: Infect a subject with a magical disease.

Spell.name: Control Construct
Spell.short_description: Take control of a construct.

Spell.name: Control Summoned Creature
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, cleric/oracle 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner/unchained summoner 3, occultist 3, psychic 4, mesmerist 3
Spell.short_description: Direct a summoned monster as if you had summoned it.

Spell.name: Corrosive Consumption
Spell.short_description: Acidic patch damages an opponent.

Spell.name: Corrosive Touch
Spell.short_description: Touch attack deals 1d4 acid/level.

Spell.name: Countless Eyes
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 3, inquisitor 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, bloodrager 3, occultist 3, psychic 3
Spell.short_description: Extra eyes give all-around vision.

Spell.name: Create Demiplane
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 8, sorcerer/wizard 8, summoner/unchained summoner 6, witch 8, occultist 6, psychic 8
Spell.short_description: As lesser create demiplane, but larger and with planar traits.

Spell.name: Create Demiplane, Lesser
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 7, sorcerer/wizard 7, summoner 5, witch 7, occultist 5, psychic 7, unchained summoner 6
Spell.short_description: Create your own demiplane.

Spell.name: Create Demiplane, Greater
Spell.short_description: As create demiplane, but larger and with more planar traits.

Spell.name: Curse, Major
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 5, sorcerer/wizard 6, witch 5, shaman 5, occultist 5, psychic 6, mesmerist 4, spiritualist 5
Spell.short_description: As bestow curse, but harder to remove.

Spell.name: Curse Of Disgust
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, sorcerer/wizard 5, witch 5, occultist 4, psychic 6, mesmerist 3
Spell.short_description: Target is sickened when viewing a trigger.

Spell.name: Curse of Magic Negation
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 5, inquisitor 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, witch 4, occultist 4, psychic 4, mesmerist 3
Spell.short_description: Target gains the negated spellblight.

Spell.name: Cursed Earth
Spell.area: 1-mile radius emanating from the touched point
Spell.short_description: Plants die, living creatures catch diseases, or dead creatures rise as zombies.

Spell.name: Cushioning Bands
Spell.short_description: Force bands protect against crushing.

Spell.name: Dance of a Hundred Cuts
Spell.short_description: Gain +1 combat bonus/3 levels.

Spell.name: Dance of a Thousand Cuts
Spell.short_description: As dance of a hundred cuts, plus the benefits of haste.

Spell.name: Darkvision, Greater
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 4, antipaladin 4, ranger 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, occultist 4, psychic 4, medium 4
Spell.short_description: See 120 ft. in total darkness.

Spell.name: Daze, Mass
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, inquisitor 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner/unchained summoner 4, witch 4, occultist 4, psychic 3, mesmerist 4, medium 3
Spell.short_description: As daze, but affecting multiple creatures.

Spell.name: Decompose Corpse
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, druid 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, spiritualist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Turn a corpse into a clean skeleton.

Spell.name: Defensive Shock
Spell.short_description: Electricity damages your attackers.

Spell.name: Delay Pain
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, inquisitor 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, bloodrager 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2
Spell.short_description: Ignore pain for 1 hour/level.

Spell.name: Delusional Pride
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Target is penalized on attacks and checks but gains bonus against charms and compulsions.

Spell.name: Diagnose Disease
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, druid 1, paladin 1, ranger 1, witch 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1
Spell.area: one creature, one object, or a 5-ft. cube
Spell.short_description: Detect and identify diseases.

Spell.name: Disfiguring Touch
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, bloodrager 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, spiritualist 2
Spell.short_description: Target becomes disfigured.
Spell.mythic_text: The target takes two different penalties (chosen from the same list) instead of one.
Spell.augmented: Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, the target also gains the fatigued condition because of its painful disfigurement. If this fatigue is negated without removing the curse, it returns after 1 hour.

Spell.name: Disguise Other
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, inquisitor 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: As disguise self, but affects you or another.

Spell.name: Distracting Cacophony
Spell.short_description: Noise makes it difficult to cast.

Spell.name: Distressing Tone
Spell.short_description: Sound sickens 1d4 creatures.

Spell.name: Divine Pursuit
Spell.short_description: Gain a movement type of your prey.
Spell.mythic_text: The speed of the movement form provided by the spell increases by 30 feet. This adjustment is treated as an enhancement bonus. You gain a bonus on Perception and Survival skill checks attempted against the selected creature. This is a sacred bonus if you're good or a profane bonus if you're evil; if you're neutral, choose either the sacred or profane bonus.

Spell.name: Dread Bolt
Spell.short_description: Harm and possibly sicken good creatures.

Spell.name: Eagle Aerie
Spell.short_description: Summon 1 giant eagle/3 levels.

Spell.name: Ear-Piercing Scream
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, inquisitor 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, bloodrager 1, psychic 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Deal sonic damage and daze target.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 1d8 points of sonic damage per 2 caster levels (maximum 5d8) and the duration that creatures in the area are dazed is a number of rounds equal to your tier.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell affects a 30-foot cone rather than a single target.

Spell.name: Echolocation
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 4, bard 4, druid 4, sorcerer/wizard 5, occultist 4, psychic 5
Spell.short_description: Sonic sense gives you blindsight 40 ft.

Spell.name: Eldritch Fever
Spell.short_description: Target gains the eldritch ague spellblight.

Spell.name: Envious Urge
Spell.short_description: Targets steal from or disarm others.

Spell.name: Epidemic
Spell.short_description: Infect a subject with a highly contagious disease.

Spell.name: Eruptive Pustules
Spell.short_description: Acid boils burst when you are attacked.

Spell.name: Excruciating Deformation
Spell.short_description: Target takes Dex and Con damage.

Spell.name: Exquisite Accompaniment
Spell.short_description: Instrument maintains bardic performance for you.

Spell.name: False Life, Greater
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, witch 4, bloodrager 4, shaman 4, occultist 4, psychic 4, mesmerist 3, spiritualist 4, medium 3
Spell.duration: 1 hour/level or until discharged; see text
Spell.short_description: Gain 2d10 temporary hp + 1/level.

Spell.name: Familiar Melding
Spell.duration: 1 hour/level or until you return to your body
Spell.short_description: Possess your familiar.

Spell.name: Fickle Winds
Spell.short_description: Wind walls selectively block attacks.

Spell.name: Fleshworm Infestation
Spell.short_description: Worms deal hp and Dex damage.

Spell.name: Forbid Action
Spell.short_description: Target obeys your command to not do something.

Spell.name: Forbid Action, Greater
Spell.short_description: As forbid action, but 1 creature/level.

Spell.name: Force Hook Charge
Spell.short_description: Hook of force drags you to the target.

Spell.name: Force Punch
Spell.short_description: Target takes 1d4 force damage per level and is pushed away.

Spell.name: Forced Quiet
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, inquisitor 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1
Spell.short_description: Target cannot make loud noises.

Spell.name: Frigid Touch
Spell.short_description: Target takes cold damage and is staggered.

Spell.name: Frostbite
Spell.short_description: Target takes cold damage and is fatigued.

Spell.name: Fumbletongue
Spell.short_description: Target cannot speak intelligently.

Spell.name: Fungal Infestation
Spell.short_description: Target takes bleed from attacks.

Spell.name: Ghostly Disguise
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 2, bard 2, inquisitor 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: You look like a ghost of yourself.

Spell.name: Haunting Choir
Spell.short_description: Spirits cause wracking pain to listeners.

Spell.name: Haunting Mists
Spell.short_description: Creatures are shaken and take Wis damage.

Spell.name: Hex Ward
Spell.short_description: Target gains +4 on saves against witch hexes.
Spell.mythic_text: The target gains immunity to one witch hex (but not a major hex or grand hex) of your choice.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, instead of granting immunity to one witch hex, you can grant immunity to two hexes or one major hex. If you're at least 6th tier and expend three uses of mythic power, you instead grant immunity to three hexes, two major hexes, or one grand hex.

Spell.name: Holy Ice
Spell.duration: 1 minute/level, instantaneous, or until expended (see text)
Spell.short_description: Create wall or javelins of frozen holy water.

Spell.name: Holy Shield
Spell.short_description: Lend your shield's protection to another.

Spell.name: Horn of Pursuit
Spell.short_description: Create three notes heard miles away.

Spell.name: Howling Agony
Spell.spell_level: inquisitor 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, bloodrager 3, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, spiritualist 3
Spell.short_description: Screaming pain limits the target's actions.

Spell.name: Ice Body
Spell.short_description: Your body becomes living ice.

Spell.name: Ice Crystal Teleport
Spell.short_description: Target is frozen, then teleported.

Spell.name: Icicle Dagger
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, witch 1, bloodrager 1, occultist 1
Spell.short_description: Masterwork ice dagger deals +1 cold damage.

Spell.name: Icy Prison
Spell.short_description: Thick ice holds and damages the target.

Spell.name: Icy Prison, Mass
Spell.short_description: As icy prison, but it affects 1 creature/level.

Spell.name: Imbue with Aura
Spell.short_description: Target emulates your cleric aura.

Spell.name: Interplanetary Teleport
Spell.short_description: Teleport to another planet.

Spell.name: Interrogation
Spell.short_description: Target answers questions or suffers pain.

Spell.name: Interrogation, Greater
Spell.short_description: As interrogation, except with more pain and more questions.

Spell.name: Joyful Rapture
Spell.area: all allies and opponents within a 60-ft.-radius burst centered on you
Spell.short_description: Negate harmful emotions.

Spell.name: Ki Arrow
Spell.short_description: Arrow deals damage as your unarmed strike.

Spell.name: Ki Leech
Spell.short_description: Add to your ki pool when you critically hit.

Spell.name: Ki Shout
Spell.short_description: Target takes 1d6 sonic/level and is stunned.

Spell.name: Know The Enemy
Spell.short_description: Gain +10 on a monster Knowledge check.
Spell.mythic_text: The insight bonus increases to +15 plus your tier. If the check is successful, you gain a +5 insight bonus on your next attack roll or saving throw against a creature of that type, as long as the roll occurs within 24 hours of casting the spell.

Spell.name: Leashed Shackles
Spell.short_description: Target is restricted to a specific location.

Spell.name: Lend Judgment
Spell.short_description: Ally gains the benefit of one judgment.

Spell.name: Lend Judgment, Greater
Spell.short_description: Ally receives all your judgments.

Spell.name: Lightning Arc
Spell.short_description: Targets in a line take 1d6 electricity/level.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 1d8 points of electricity damage per caster level (maximum 15d8). A target that fails its save is blinded by the flash for 1 round and deafened by thunder for 1d4 rounds.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the two targets can be up to 120 feet apart, the lightning can turn once up to 90 degrees to connect the targets, and the spell's electrical damage bypasses electricity resistance and electricity immunity.

Spell.name: Loathsome Veil
Spell.short_description: Nauseate and/or sicken weak creatures.

Spell.name: Lunar Veil
Spell.short_description: Dispel light and revert lycanthropes.

Spell.name: Mad Hallucination
Spell.short_description: Target takes penalties to mental actions.

Spell.name: Mad Monkeys
Spell.short_description: Summon a swarm of mischievous monkeys.

Spell.name: Malfunction
Spell.short_description: Construct behaves oddly for 1 round/level.

Spell.name: Malicious Spite
Spell.short_description: Target is compelled to plot against another.

Spell.name: Marionette Possession
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, witch 3, psychic 3, mesmerist 3
Spell.duration: 10 minutes/level or until you return to your body
Spell.short_description: As magic jar, but limited to line of sight.

Spell.name: Masterwork Transformation
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, occultist 2
Spell.short_description: Make a normal item into a masterwork one.

Spell.name: Miserable Pity
Spell.short_description: Opponents cannot attack a pathetic creature.

Spell.name: Monstrous Physique I
Spell.short_description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium monstrous humanoid.
Spell.mythic_text: Each mythic monstrous physique spell must be learned individually, and you must know the respective non-mythic monstrous physique spell to learn its mythic version. You don't have to learn them in order, and aren't required to know a lower-level mythic monstrous physique spell before you learn a higher-level one (for example, you can learn mythic monstrous physique II if you know monstrous physique II, even if you don't know mythic monstrous physique I). Each mythic monstrous physique spell adds the following benefits to its respective non-mythic version. The spell's bonuses to ability scores increase by 2 each, the natural armor bonus increases by 1, and the ability score penalties decrease by 2 each (minimum penalty of 0). Alternatively, you can cast this spell on another willing creature, changing the range to touch and the target to one creature.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (4th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the ability score bonuses increase by an additional 2. Additionally, you can cast this spell on other willing creatures, changing the range to touch and the target to one creature per tier.

Spell.name: Monstrous Physique II
Spell.short_description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Tiny or Large monstrous humanoid.
Spell.mythic_text: Each mythic monstrous physique spell must be learned individually, and you must know the respective non-mythic monstrous physique spell to learn its mythic version. You don't have to learn them in order, and aren't required to know a lower-level mythic monstrous physique spell before you learn a higher-level one (for example, you can learn mythic monstrous physique II if you know monstrous physique II, even if you don't know mythic monstrous physique I). Each mythic monstrous physique spell adds the following benefits to its respective non-mythic version. The spell's bonuses to ability scores increase by 2 each, the natural armor bonus increases by 1, and the ability score penalties decrease by 2 each (minimum penalty of 0). Alternatively, you can cast this spell on another willing creature, changing the range to touch and the target to one creature.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (4th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the ability score bonuses increase by an additional 2. Additionally, you can cast this spell on other willing creatures, changing the range to touch and the target to one creature per tier.

Spell.name: Monstrous Physique III
Spell.short_description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Diminutive or Huge monstrous humanoid.
Spell.mythic_text: Each mythic monstrous physique spell must be learned individually, and you must know the respective non-mythic monstrous physique spell to learn its mythic version. You don't have to learn them in order, and aren't required to know a lower-level mythic monstrous physique spell before you learn a higher-level one (for example, you can learn mythic monstrous physique II if you know monstrous physique II, even if you don't know mythic monstrous physique I). Each mythic monstrous physique spell adds the following benefits to its respective non-mythic version. The spell's bonuses to ability scores increase by 2 each, the natural armor bonus increases by 1, and the ability score penalties decrease by 2 each (minimum penalty of 0). Alternatively, you can cast this spell on another willing creature, changing the range to touch and the target to one creature.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (4th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the ability score bonuses increase by an additional 2. Additionally, you can cast this spell on other willing creatures, changing the range to touch and the target to one creature per tier.

Spell.name: Monstrous Physique IV
Spell.short_description: As monstrous physique III, with more abilities.
Spell.mythic_text: Each mythic monstrous physique spell must be learned individually, and you must know the respective non-mythic monstrous physique spell to learn its mythic version. You don't have to learn them in order, and aren't required to know a lower-level mythic monstrous physique spell before you learn a higher-level one (for example, you can learn mythic monstrous physique II if you know monstrous physique II, even if you don't know mythic monstrous physique I). Each mythic monstrous physique spell adds the following benefits to its respective non-mythic version. The spell's bonuses to ability scores increase by 2 each, the natural armor bonus increases by 1, and the ability score penalties decrease by 2 each (minimum penalty of 0). Alternatively, you can cast this spell on another willing creature, changing the range to touch and the target to one creature.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (4th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the ability score bonuses increase by an additional 2. Additionally, you can cast this spell on other willing creatures, changing the range to touch and the target to one creature per tier.

Spell.name: Murderous Command
Spell.spell_level: antipaladin 1, cleric/oracle 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Target is compelled to kill its ally.
Spell.mythic_text: This spell lasts for a number of rounds equal to your tier. Each round after the first, the target can attempt a new saving throw at the beginning of its turn to break free of the spell.
Spell.augmented: Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, the target attacks its nearest ally with its most powerful spell, spell-like ability, or supernatural ability. If it has no such ability, it attacks the ally with a melee weapon or natural weapon as normal and gains a +4 morale bonus on the attack and damage rolls.

Spell.name: Oppressive Boredom
Spell.short_description: Target loses its next action.

Spell.name: Oracle's Vessel
Spell.short_description: Oracle only. Target gains the benefits of your oracle's curse.

Spell.name: Orb Of The Void
Spell.short_description: Sphere inflicts negative levels.
Spell.mythic_text: A creature that fails its save against the orb gains 2 negative levels rather than 1. A successful Fortitude save reduces this to 1 negative level.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the orb doesn't automatically stop when in enters a space with a living creature, but the saving throw DC decreases by 2 for each creature after the first it affects each round. An individual creature can be affected by the orb of the void only once per round, even if the orb moves through its space more than once.

Spell.name: Overwhelming Grief
Spell.short_description: Grieving target can take no actions and is denied its Dex bonus.

Spell.name: Overwhelming Presence
Spell.spell_level: bard 6, cleric/oracle 9, inquisitor 6, sorcerer/wizard 9, psychic 4, mesmerist 6
Spell.short_description: Creatures bow before you as if you were divine.

Spell.name: Pernicious Poison
Spell.short_description: Target takes a –4 penalty against poison.
Spell.mythic_text: The number of successful saving throws needed to cure a poison increases by one. If the poison deals ability damage on a failed saving throw, that ability damage increases by 1.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the target's penalty on saves against poison increases to -8, and the penalty for attempting to cure the target with skill or magic increases to -8. If you expend three uses of mythic power, the poison bypasses the creature's poison immunity (this doesn't affect poison immunity from not having a Constitution score).

Spell.name: Persuasive Goad
Spell.short_description: Target takes 1d6 nonlethal damage; you gain an Intimidate bonus.

Spell.name: Piercing Shriek
Spell.short_description: Target is staggered by a painful sound.

Spell.name: Plague Carrier
Spell.short_description: Target's attacks carry filth fever.

Spell.name: Plague Storm
Spell.short_description: Cloud infects creatures like contagion.

Spell.name: Play Instrument
Spell.short_description: Play instrument as if you were skilled.

Spell.name: Polar Midnight
Spell.short_description: Cold darkness paralyzes and deals damage.

Spell.name: Polypurpose Panacea
Spell.short_description: Gain a relaxing or entertaining effect.

Spell.name: Possess Object
Spell.duration: 1 hour/level or until you return to your body
Spell.short_description: Possess and animate one object.

Spell.name: Prediction of Failure
Spell.short_description: Target is permanently shaken and sickened, and may gain a spellblight.

Spell.name: Primal Scream
Spell.short_description: Free yourself from enchantments and paralysis effects.

Spell.name: Protective Penumbra
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, spiritualist 2
Spell.short_description: Shadow protects the target from light.

Spell.name: Rain of Frogs
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, druid 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, witch 3, shaman 4, psychic 3
Spell.short_description: Summon a swarm of poisonous frogs.

Spell.name: Raise Animal Companion
Spell.short_description: As raise dead, but on an animal.

Spell.name: Rapid Repair
Spell.short_description: Construct gains fast healing 5.

Spell.name: Ray of Sickening
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, druid 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, witch 1, bloodrager 1, mesmerist 1
Spell.short_description: Ray makes the subject sickened.

Spell.name: Reckless Infatuation
Spell.short_description: Target is compelled to stay near another.

Spell.name: Remove Sickness
Spell.short_description: Suppress disease, nausea, and the sickened condition.

Spell.name: Reprobation
Spell.short_description: Marked target is shunned by your religion.

Spell.name: Resonating Word
Spell.short_description: Target is damaged, staggered, and stunned.
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 8d6 points on the 1st and 2nd rounds and 15d6 on the 3rd round. The target takes a -4 penalty on saving throws against all sonic effects.

Spell.name: Restore Corpse
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, druid 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Skeletal corpse grows flesh.

Spell.name: Restore Eidolon
Spell.short_description: Restoration for an eidolon.

Spell.name: Restore Eidolon, Lesser
Spell.short_description: Lesser restoration for an eidolon.

Spell.name: Ride the Lightning
Spell.short_description: Transform into electricity.

Spell.name: Ride The Waves
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 4, druid 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, witch 4, bloodrager 4, shaman 4
Spell.short_description: Target can breathe water and swim.

Spell.name: Sanctify Corpse
Spell.short_description: Prevent a corpse from becoming an undead creature.

Spell.name: Sands of Time
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, shaman 4, occultist 3, psychic 3, spiritualist 3
Spell.short_description: Target temporarily ages.

Spell.name: Scouring Winds
Spell.short_description: Winds block vision and deal 3d6 damage.
Spell.mythic_text: The spell's damage increases to 4d8 points of piercing damage. Any creature in the area at the start of your turn must succeed at a Reflex save or be blinded for as long as it remains in the area and for 1d4 rounds after it leaves.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (5th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the sandstorm's radius and height each increase to 40 feet, and the damage dealt increases to 6d8 points of piercing damage. Each round, you can either move the storm up to 50 feet as a move action or up to 10 feet as a swift action.

Spell.name: Sculpt Simulacrum
Spell.short_description: Alter a simulacrum's appearance.

Spell.name: Serenity
Spell.short_description: Peaceful feelings harm those attempting violence.

Spell.name: Shadowbard
Spell.short_description: Shadowy duplicate starts a bardic performance.

Spell.name: Shadow Step
Spell.short_description: Teleport from one shadow to another.

Spell.name: Shadow Weapon
Spell.short_description: Create a quasi-real masterwork weapon.
Spell.mythic_text: Add your tier to your caster level when determining what enhancement bonus or weapon special abilities the weapon can have. The weapon deals half damage to creatures that disbelieve in it and to objects, instead of only 1 point. You can spend a swift action to transform the weapon into a dull black metal ring on your finger, or to return it from its ring form to its weapon form in your hand.

Spell.name: Shard of Chaos
Spell.short_description: Harm and possibly slow lawful creatures.

Spell.name: Share Memory
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Share one memory with the target.

Spell.name: Simulacrum, Lesser
Spell.short_description: Creates a double of a weak creature.

Spell.name: Skinsend
Spell.short_description: Animate and possess your own skin as if it were a separate creature.

Spell.name: Smug Narcissism
Spell.short_description: Target is distracted by its sense of self.

Spell.name: Snapdragon Fireworks
Spell.short_description: Create 1 dragon firework/level.

Spell.name: Sonic Thrust
Spell.short_description: Sound moves targets away from you.

Spell.name: Soothe Construct
Spell.short_description: Reduce the berserk chance of a construct.

Spell.name: Spear Of Purity
Spell.short_description: Harm and possibly blind evil creatures.

Spell.name: Spit Venom
Spell.short_description: Spit blinding black adder venom.

Spell.name: Steal Voice
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Target gains the croaking spellblight.

Spell.name: Strangling Hair
Spell.short_description: Your hair animates and grapples.
Spell.mythic_text: You may use your hair to attempt dirty trick, disarm, steal, or trip combat maneuvers instead of grapple combat maneuvers. Add your tier to combat maneuver checks attempted with your hair and to your hair's damage rolls made as part of a grapple.

Spell.name: Summon Elder Worm
Spell.short_description: Summon a giant purple worm.

Spell.name: Summon Froghemoth
Spell.short_description: Summon a froghemoth.

Spell.name: Summon Minor Ally
Spell.short_description: Summon 1d3 Tiny animals.

Spell.name: Summon Minor Monster
Spell.spell_level: antipaladin 1, bard 1, cleric/oracle 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, witch 1, psychic 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Summon 1d3 Tiny animals.

Spell.name: Surmount Affliction
Spell.short_description: Temporarily suppress one condition.
Spell.mythic_text: You can cast this spell with no verbal or somatic component, and even if you're helpless (but not unconscious). You temporarily overcome a number of additional harmful conditions equal to half your tier.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (7th): If you expend three uses of mythic power, you become immune to all afflictions the spell can normally overcome. In addition, you overcome (but do not become immune to) one of the following conditions: exhausted, nauseated, panicked, petrified, staggered, and stunned.

Spell.name: Symbol of Healing
Spell.short_description: Triggered rune heals living creatures.

Spell.name: Symbol of Mirroring
Spell.short_description: Triggered rune creates mirror images.

Spell.name: Symbol of Revelation
Spell.short_description: Triggered symbol reveals illusions.

Spell.name: Symbol of Scrying
Spell.short_description: Triggered rune activates scrying sensor.

Spell.name: Symbol of Sealing
Spell.short_description: Create triggered wall of force.

Spell.name: Symbol of Slowing
Spell.short_description: Triggered rune slows creatures.

Spell.name: Symbol of Strife
Spell.short_description: Triggered rune makes creatures attack.

Spell.name: Symbol of Vulnerability
Spell.short_description: Triggered rune gives penalties.

Spell.name: Tar Ball
Spell.short_description: Burning tar harms target and penalizes its Dex.

Spell.name: Temporary Resurrection
Spell.short_description: Bring a creature to life for 24 hours, after which it dies again.

Spell.name: Terrible Remorse
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, cleric/oracle 4, inquisitor 3, sorcerer/wizard 4, psychic 4, mesmerist 3, spiritualist 4
Spell.short_description: Creature is compelled to harm itself.

Spell.name: Touch of Slime
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 4, druid 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, witch 4, bloodrager 4, psychic 4
Spell.short_description: Touch infests a target with green slime.

Spell.name: Toxic Gift
Spell.short_description: Target suffers the effect of the poison in you.

Spell.name: Transmute Blood To Acid
Spell.short_description: Target takes acid damage each round, and its attackers take acid damage.

Spell.name: Unadulterated Loathing
Spell.spell_level: antipaladin 2, bard 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, psychic 3, mesmerist 2
Spell.short_description: Target is compelled to avoid another creature.

Spell.name: Unbreakable Construct
Spell.short_description: Increase construct hardness or DR.

Spell.name: Undead Anatomy I
Spell.short_description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium undead.

Spell.name: Undead Anatomy II
Spell.short_description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Tiny or Large undead.

Spell.name: Undead Anatomy III
Spell.short_description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Diminutive or Huge undead.

Spell.name: Undead Anatomy IV
Spell.short_description: As undead anatomy III, but with more abilities.

Spell.name: Unholy Ice
Spell.duration: 1 minute/level, instantaneous, or until expended (see text)
Spell.short_description: Create wall or javelins of frozen unholy water.

Spell.name: Unholy Sword
Spell.short_description: Weapon becomes +5, deals +2d6 damage vs. good.

Spell.name: Unnatural Lust
Spell.short_description: Target is compelled to kiss or caress another.

Spell.name: Unprepared Combatant
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Target takes –4 on initiative and Reflex saves.

Spell.name: Unshakable Chill
Spell.short_description: Target is afflicted with severe cold.
Spell.mythic_text: On a failed save, the target immediately takes 1d6 points of nonlethal cold damage per tier. Add your tier to the DC of any other Fortitude saves the target attempts to resist severe cold as part of the spell's effects. The target also takes a -4 penalty on saves against spells or effects with the cold descriptor.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (5th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the target gains vulnerability to fire (Bestiary 305).

Spell.name: Utter Contempt
Spell.short_description: Target's attitude worsens by two categories.

Spell.name: Vengeful Outrage
Spell.short_description: Target is compelled to destroy one enemy.

Spell.name: Vermin Shape I
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 4, druid 3, magus 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, witch 3, bloodrager 4
