Spell.short_description: Take the form and some of the powers of a Small or Medium vermin.

Spell.name: Vermin Shape II
Spell.short_description: As vermin shape, but Tiny or Large.

Spell.name: Vestment of the Champion
Spell.short_description: Armor or shield gains a

Spell.name: Virtuoso Performance
Spell.short_description: Start a second bardic performance while maintaining the first.

Spell.name: Vision of Hell
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, cleric/oracle 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, bloodrager 3, occultist 3, psychic 3, mesmerist 3
Spell.short_description: Illusory hellscape makes creatures shaken.

Spell.name: Vitriolic Mist
Spell.short_description: As fire shield, except acid damage.

Spell.name: Vocal Alteration
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 1, bard 1, inquisitor 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Disguise target's voice.

Spell.name: Volcanic Storm
Spell.short_description: Hot rocks deal 5d6 damage.

Spell.name: Wall of Sound
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, magus 4, sorcerer/wizard 5, bloodrager 4, psychic 5, spiritualist 5
Spell.short_description: Sonic wall deflects and damages creatures.

Spell.name: Wartrain Mount
Spell.spell_level: antipaladin 1, bard 2, druid 2, inquisitor 1, paladin 1, ranger 1, mesmerist 2
Spell.short_description: Animal gains the combat training general purpose.

Spell.name: Waves of Ecstasy
Spell.spell_level: bard 6, cleric/oracle 7, sorcerer/wizard 7, witch 7, psychic 7, mesmerist 6
Spell.short_description: Pleasure stuns and staggers creatures.

Spell.name: Web Shelter
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2, witch 2, shaman 2
Spell.short_description: Create a comfortable shelter made of webbing.

Spell.name: Witness
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, inquisitor 3, witch 3, occultist 3, psychic 3, mesmerist 3, medium 3
Spell.short_description: See through the target's eyes and ears.

Spell.name: Wooden Phalanx
Spell.short_description: Creates 1d4+2 temporary wood golems to fight for you.

Spell.name: Word of Resolve
Spell.short_description: Ally rerolls a save against charm or fear.

Spell.name: Youthful Appearance
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 1, bard 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Target appears younger.

Spell.name: Summon Accuser
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, cleric/oracle 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner/unchained summoner 4, witch 4

Spell.name: Summon Infernal Host
Spell.spell_level: bard 5, cleric/oracle 5, sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner/unchained summoner 5, witch 5

Spell.name: Summon Totem Creature
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 3, druid 3, ranger 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3

Spell.name: Silk To Steel
Spell.short_description: Use a scarf as a shield or whip.

Spell.name: Bite the Hand
Spell.spell_level: druid 3, inquisitor 3, sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner/unchained summoner 3, witch 4

Spell.name: Bite the Hand, Mass
Spell.spell_level: druid 6, inquisitor 6, sorcerer/wizard 7, summoner/unchained summoner 6, witch 7

Spell.name: Aroden's Spellbane
Spell.mythic_text: Add half your tier to the number of spells you can select to notfunction in the area. As a full-round action, you can expend one useof mythic power to change one of the spells blocked by this effect.You can do this as often as you wish during the spell's duration.

Spell.name: Crusader's Edge
Spell.mythic_text: Whenever you confirm a critical hit against an outsider with theevil subtype, you gain 2d6 temporary hit points. While wieldingthis weapon, you gain a +2 sacred bonus on saving throwsagainst spells, spell-like abilities, and special abilities originatingfrom evil outsiders.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (5th): You can expend two uses of mythic powerto give the touched weapon the holy weapon special ability.

Spell.name: Eldritch Conduit, Greater
Spell.area: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

Spell.name: Fleshcurdle
Spell.mythic_text: You can choose two effects instead of one effect, or maychoose to enhance one effect. If you enhance the attackeffect, all of the creature's natural attacks are affected. Ifyou enhance the defense effect, in addition to fleshcurdle's normal effect on natural armor bonus, any critical threatsagainst the creature gain a +4 bonus on the confirmation roll.If you enhance the movement effect, all of the creature'smovement speeds are halved.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythic power,you can choose two enhanced effects to inflict upon the target.

Spell.name: Music of the Spheres
Spell.duration: concentration, up to 1 round per level

Spell.name: Song of Kyonin
Spell.duration: 1 round/level or until performance ends or changes (see text)

Spell.name: Vengeful Comets
Spell.duration: 1 round/level or until completely discharged (see below)

Spell.name: Ablative Barrier
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 2, magus 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner 2, bloodrager 2, occultist 2, psychic 3, unchained summoner 3
Spell.short_description: Surrounds the target with layers of force.
Spell.mythic_text: Add half your tier to the spell's armor bonus. Add half your tier to the amount of lethal damage from each attack that is converted to nonlethal damage and to the DR against nonlethal damage. Add half your tier to your caster level when determining how much damage the spell converts before it's discharged.

Spell.name: Absorb Toxicity
Spell.short_description: You become immune to diseases and toxins, absorb one, and then spread it to others.

Spell.name: Abundant Ammunition
Spell.short_description: Replaces nonmagical ammunition every round.

Spell.name: Adjuring Step
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 1, bard 1, magus 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, occultist 1, psychic 1
Spell.short_description: You can move slowly and safely and still cast spells, until you move quickly, make an attack, or cast a harmful spell.

Spell.name: Adoration
Spell.short_description: You gain a bonus on Diplomacy checks and performance combat checks.

Spell.name: Air Bubble
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 1, druid 1, ranger 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, psychic 1
Spell.short_description: Creates a small pocket of air around your head or an object.

Spell.name: Air Walk, Communal
Spell.short_description: As air walk, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Animal Aspect
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 2, magus 2, druid 2, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, bloodrager 2, psychic 2
Spell.short_description: You gain some of the beneficial qualities of an animal.
Spell.mythic_text: You gain low-light vision, a +2 size bonus to the physical ability score of your choice, and a +1 enhancement bonus to your natural armor. Alternatively, you may cast the non-mythic form of this spell on a touched willing creature.

Spell.name: Animal Aspect, Greater
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 3, magus 3, druid 3, ranger 3, sorcerer/wizard 4, bloodrager 3, psychic 4
Spell.short_description: As animal aspect, but you gain two animal qualities.

Spell.name: Ant Haul, Communal
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 2, cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2, occultist 2, psychic 2
Spell.short_description: As ant haul, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Arcane Cannon
Spell.short_description: Your focus becomes a magical cannon that fires on its own.

Spell.name: Bestow Weapon Proficiency
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 2, antipaladin 2, cleric/oracle 2, magus 2, inquisitor 2, paladin 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Grants a creature proficiency in a single weapon for short period of time.

Spell.name: Blistering Invective
Spell.short_description: Make an Intimidate check against all foes within 30 feet; those demoralized also take fire damage.
Spell.mythic_text: Enemies that are demoralized by your Intimidate check take 2d8 points of fire damage and catch fire (no saving throw). Any Reflex save attempted to extinguish the flames automatically fails as long as the creature remains demoralized by your Intimidate check.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (5th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the spell doesn't have the language-dependent descriptor and you don't take a penalty on your Intimidate check to demoralize creatures that are larger than you.

Spell.name: Bowstaff
Spell.short_description: A shortbow may double as a club, or a longbow as a quarterstaff.

Spell.name: Brow Gasher
Spell.spell_level: inquisitor 2, magus 2, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, bloodrager 2, occultist 2
Spell.short_description: Slashing weapon deals bleed damage to an opponent's head.

Spell.name: Bullet Shield
Spell.short_description: You gain a +4 deflection bonus to AC against firearm attacks.

Spell.name: Burst of Speed
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 3, antipaladin 3, magus 3, inquisitor 3, paladin 3, ranger 3, bloodrager 3, psychic 3, medium 3
Spell.short_description: You gain increased speed, and your movement ignores attacks of opportunity and allows you to move through the space of creatures larger than you are.

Spell.name: Caging Bomb Admixture
Spell.short_description: Your bombs create a cage of force that traps creatures inside the bomb's splash radius.

Spell.name: Certain Grip
Spell.short_description: You gain a +4 competence bonus on Acrobatics and Climb checks and to CMD.

Spell.name: Chain of Perdition
Spell.short_description: Creates a floating chain of force.

Spell.name: Companion Mind Link
Spell.short_description: You can talk with your animal companion, and can handle it with supernatural ease.

Spell.name: Compel Hostility
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, cleric/oracle 1, inquisitor 1, paladin 1, ranger 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, witch 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Compels opponents to attack you instead of your allies.

Spell.name: Damp Powder
Spell.short_description: Ruins ammunition loaded in the targeted firearm.

Spell.name: Darkvision, Communal
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 3, antipaladin 3, ranger 4, sorcerer/wizard 3, occultist 3, psychic 3
Spell.short_description: As darkvision, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Daybreak Arrow
Spell.short_description: Targeted ammunition exudes radiant energy.
Spell.mythic_text: The additional damage to undead and creatures harmed by sunlight increases to 1d8. The affected ammunition is entirely composed of radiant energy, and bypasses all damage resistance from undead targets and those harmed by sunlight. The duration of the sunrod light effect increases to 1 minute.

Spell.name: Deadly Juggernaut
Spell.short_description: Your might increases with every kill you make.

Spell.name: Deadeye's Lore
Spell.short_description: Gain a +4 bonus on Survival and move full speed while tracking.

Spell.name: Debilitating Portent
Spell.short_description: Inflicts an ill fate on a creature, halving its damage when it attacks or casts a spell

Spell.name: Delay Poison, Communal
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 3, bard 3, cleric/oracle 3, druid 3, inquisitor 3, paladin 3, ranger 3, witch 3
Spell.short_description: As delay poison, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Destabilize Powder
Spell.short_description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm is prone to misfire.

Spell.name: Discovery Torch
Spell.short_description: Object touched emanates bright light, granting Perception and Sense Motive bonuses.

Spell.name: Divine Arrow
Spell.short_description: Imbues a projectile with holy energy.

Spell.name: Dust Form
Spell.short_description: You become an incorporeal creature of dust for a short period of time.

Spell.name: Effortless Armor
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 2, inquisitor 2, magus 2, paladin 2, ranger 2, occultist 2, psychic 2
Spell.short_description: Armor you wear no longer slows your speed.

Spell.name: Endure Elements, Communal
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 3, cleric/oracle 2, druid 2, paladin 2, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, psychic 2
Spell.short_description: As endure elements, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Energy Siege Shot
Spell.short_description: A Large siege engine deals energy damage that you designate with other effects depending on the type of energy you choose.

Spell.name: Energy Siege Shot, Greater
Spell.short_description: As energy siege shot, but you can affect any size siege engine.

Spell.name: Fabricate Bullets
Spell.short_description: Converts 1 pound of metal into ammunition.

Spell.name: Fiery Shuriken
Spell.short_description: Calls forth several fiery projectiles ready to be flung at opponents.

Spell.name: Find Quarry
Spell.short_description: You can sense whether a particular creature is within 20 miles of your location.

Spell.name: Flash Fire
Spell.short_description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm creates a tremendous flash capable of blinding the weapon's bearer and those around him.

Spell.name: Forest Friend
Spell.short_description: Plants in a forested area become helpful instead of hindering you and your allies.

Spell.name: Frightful Aspect
Spell.short_description: You take on a terrifying, Large-sized form of yourself and emit an aura that causes creatures to become shaken or frightened.

Spell.name: Frost Fall
Spell.short_description: The area is covered in a chilling frost.

Spell.name: Haunted Fey Aspect
Spell.short_description: You surround yourself with disturbing illusions.

Spell.name: Healing Thief
Spell.short_description: You siphon half of all magical healing that the targeted creature receives.
Spell.mythic_text: Instead of stealing half the target's healing, you steal all of it. The amount of damage you steal before the spell is discharged increases to 10 points per caster level (maximum 100 points).
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the range of the spell changes to close (25 feet + 5 feet per 2 caster levels). If the target has fast healing or regeneration, you steal half of its fast healing or regeneration. Healing from these abilities count toward the maximum healing stolen before the spell is discharged.

Spell.name: Heroic Invocation
Spell.short_description: Grants a number of creatures bonuses on attacks and damage, temporary hit points, and immunity to fear and charm effects.

Spell.name: Hostile Juxtaposition
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner 4, witch 5, psychic 5, unchained summoner 5
Spell.short_description: You create a dimensional link with a targeted creature, and switch spots with it.

Spell.name: Hostile Juxtaposition, Greater
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 7, summoner/unchained summoner 6, witch 7, psychic 7, mesmerist 4
Spell.short_description: You may target one creature for every four of your caster levels.

Spell.name: Hostile Levitation
Spell.spell_level: sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, bloodrager 3, occultist 3, psychic 3, mesmerist 3, spiritualist 3, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Levitates the targeted creature up off the ground.

Spell.name: Illusion of Calm
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 1, magus 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1
Spell.short_description: You appear to be standing still, even when you take some actions.

Spell.name: Instrument of Agony
Spell.short_description: Weapon exudes divine fury, granting a bonus on Intimidate checks.

Spell.name: Jolting Portent
Spell.short_description: You inflict a vengeful fate on a creature, dealing electricity damage each time it attacks or casts a spell.

Spell.name: Judgment Light
Spell.short_description: You gain an additional effect while a judgment is active.

Spell.name: Jury-Rig
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, magus 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, summoner/unchained summoner 1, witch 1, occultist 1, psychic 1
Spell.short_description: Removes the broken condition from the targeted object.

Spell.name: Kinetic Reverberation
Spell.short_description: Channels the force of an enemy's attack back into its weapon.

Spell.name: Languid Bomb Admixture
Spell.short_description: Empowers bombs you throw to cause fatigue in those directly hit or splashed by the bomb.

Spell.name: Liberating Command
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, cleric/oracle 1, druid 1, paladin 1, ranger 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Target makes an Escape Artist check as an immediate action and gains a bonus on it.

Spell.name: Life Conduit
Spell.short_description: You are bound even tighter to your eidolon than normal, and may share hit points with it through your life link ability.

Spell.name: Life Conduit, Greater
Spell.short_description: You transfer 3d6 hit points to your eidolon as a swift action.

Spell.name: Life Conduit, Improved
Spell.short_description: Transfers 2d6 hit points to your eidolon as a swift action.

Spell.name: Lightning Lash Bomb Admixture
Spell.short_description: Empowers bombs you throw with a ward that deals lightning damage each time those damaged by the bomb move more than 5 feet.

Spell.name: Litany of Defense
Spell.short_description: Doubles armor's enhancement bonus.

Spell.name: Litany Of Eloquence
Spell.short_description: Fascinates a single creature for 1 round.

Spell.name: Litany of Entanglement
Spell.short_description: Entangles a creature for 1 round.

Spell.name: Litany Of Escape
Spell.short_description: Teleports a friend out of a grapple.

Spell.name: Litany Of Madness
Spell.short_description: A single target is confused for at least 1 round.

Spell.name: Litany Of Righteousness
Spell.short_description: A single evil creature takes more damage from creatures with a good aura.

Spell.name: Litany of Sight
Spell.short_description: You can see invisible creatures and objects within 30 feet of you.

Spell.name: Litany of Sloth
Spell.short_description: Single target cannot make attacks of opportunity for 1 round.

Spell.name: Litany of Thunder
Spell.short_description: A single target is deafened until the condition is removed, and is confused for 1 round.

Spell.name: Litany Of Vengeance
Spell.short_description: Allies attacking the target of the spell gain a +5 bonus on damage rolls for 1 round.

Spell.name: Litany of Warding
Spell.short_description: You gain two additional attacks of opportunity for 1 round.

Spell.name: Litany of Weakness
Spell.short_description: Single target is fatigued for 1 round.

Spell.name: Locate Weakness
Spell.spell_level: inquisitor 3, magus 3, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, bloodrager 3, occultist 3, psychic 3
Spell.short_description: You roll damage twice when you roll damage for a critical hit and take the best damage.

Spell.name: Lock Gaze
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, inquisitor 1, magus 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1
Spell.short_description: Compels the target to look only at you for the duration of the spell.

Spell.name: Longshot
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 1, antipaladin 1, inquisitor 1, magus 1, paladin 1, ranger 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, occultist 1, psychic 1
Spell.short_description: Grants a +10 foot bonus to the range increment for any ranged weapon fired.

Spell.name: Magic Siege Engine
Spell.spell_level: antipaladin 2, cleric/oracle 2, inquisitor 2, paladin 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, occultist 2
Spell.short_description: Siege engine gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls.

Spell.name: Magic Siege Engine, Greater
Spell.spell_level: antipaladin 4, cleric/oracle 5, inquisitor 4, paladin 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, occultist 4
Spell.short_description: Siege engine gains +1 on targeting and damage rolls for every four caster levels.

Spell.name: Mask Dweomer, Communal
Spell.short_description: As mask dweomer, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Mind Blank, Communal
Spell.short_description: As mind blank, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Mirror Strike
Spell.short_description: You may strike multiple opponents with a single attack.

Spell.name: Moment of Greatness
Spell.short_description: Doubles a morale bonus.

Spell.name: Mount, Communal
Spell.spell_level: magus 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2, witch 2, occultist 2
Spell.short_description: As mount, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Mutagenic Touch
Spell.short_description: You can pass a weaker version of your mutagen to another creature.

Spell.name: Named Bullet
Spell.short_description: Imbues ammunition with accuracy against a specific creature type.
Spell.mythic_text: Increase the critical multiplier of the target weapon by 1 (maximum x4).
Spell.augmented: Augmented (2nd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the target ammunition or weapon returns to the creature that shot or threw it just before that creature's next turn (similar to a returning weapon). The spell isn't discharged until the target is used to attempt a second attack against the named creature. Ammunition that hits is destroyed and doesn't return.

Spell.name: Named Bullet, Greater
Spell.short_description: As named bullet, but deals 2 points of damage for every caster level.

Spell.name: Negative Reaction
Spell.spell_level: bard 1, magus 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, psychic 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Targeted creature may not positively influence anyone.

Spell.name: Nondetection, Communal
Spell.short_description: As nondetection, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Obsidian Flow
Spell.short_description: Converts the surface of the ground into molten glass.

Spell.name: Peacebond
Spell.short_description: Locks a weapon in place on the target's body.

Spell.name: Pellet Blast
Spell.spell_level: magus 4, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, bloodrager 4, psychic 3
Spell.short_description: Creates an explosion of conjured metal pellets.

Spell.name: Phantom Chariot
Spell.short_description: Conjures a quasi-real heavy chariot pulled by four horses.

Spell.name: Phantom Driver
Spell.short_description: Conjures a phantom to drive vehicles.

Spell.name: Phantom Steed, Communal
Spell.spell_level: bard 4, sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner/unchained summoner 3, occultist 4, spiritualist 4
Spell.short_description: As phantom steed, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Pilfering Hand
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, magus 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, spiritualist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: You may seize an object or manipulate it from afar.

Spell.name: Protection from Arrows, Communal
Spell.short_description: As protection from arrows, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Protection from Chaos, Communal
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 2, inquisitor 2, paladin 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2
Spell.short_description: As protection from chaos, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Protection from Energy, Communal
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 4, druid 4, inquisitor 4, ranger 3, sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner/unchained summoner 4, psychic 4
Spell.short_description: As protection from energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Protection from Evil, Communal
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 2, inquisitor 2, paladin 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2
Spell.short_description: As protection from evil, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Protection from Good, Communal
Spell.spell_level: antipaladin 2, cleric/oracle 2, inquisitor 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2
Spell.short_description: As protection from good, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Protection from Law, Communal
Spell.spell_level: antipaladin 2, cleric/oracle 2, inquisitor 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2
Spell.short_description: As protection from law, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Pup Shape
Spell.short_description: Transforms a single animal or magical beast into a younger and cuter version of itself for a short time.

Spell.name: Qualm
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, inquisitor 2, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, psychic 2, mesmerist 2, medium 2
Spell.short_description: Target gains penalties on ability checks, skill checks, and concentration checks until it spends an entire round doing nothing.

Spell.name: Recoil Fire
Spell.short_description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm generates excessive recoil.

Spell.name: Reinforce Armaments
Spell.short_description: Temporarily mitigates the fragile quality in targeted weapon or armor.

Spell.name: Reinforce Armaments, Communal
Spell.short_description: As reinforce armaments, but you may divide the duration among objects touched.

Spell.name: Reloading Hands
Spell.short_description: Loads a single shot into your weapon every round.

Spell.name: Resinous Skin
Spell.short_description: You gain DR 5/piercing and +4 to CMD against disarm attempts.

Spell.name: Resist Energy, Communal
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 3, cleric/oracle 3, druid 3, inquisitor 3, paladin 3, ranger 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, occultist 3, psychic 3
Spell.short_description: As resist energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Returning Weapon
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 2, inquisitor 1, magus 1, ranger 1, sorcerer/wizard 2, witch 2, bloodrager 1, occultist 1, psychic 2
Spell.short_description: Grants a weapon the returning special weapon quality.

Spell.name: Returning Weapon, Communal
Spell.spell_level: bard 3, cleric/oracle 3, inquisitor 2, magus 2, ranger 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, witch 3, occultist 2, psychic 3
Spell.short_description: As returning weapon, but you may divide the duration among weapons touched.

Spell.name: Ricochet Shot
Spell.short_description: Imbues a projectile weapon to give its ammunition the ability to ricochet.
Spell.mythic_text: If the attack hits the secondary target, the wielder can select a tertiary target within 20 feet of the secondary target. This functions like a ricochet off the primary target. The tertiary target must be a different creature than the primary target.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, the secondary and tertiary attacks gain the enhancement bonus and magic qualities of the attack against the primary target.

Spell.name: See Alignment
Spell.short_description: Pick an alignment; in your sight, creatures and items with that alignment emit a ghostly radiance.

Spell.name: Shadow Bomb Admixture
Spell.short_description: Empowers bombs you throw to cover the target with a shadowy substance that grants it concealment and limits its vision.

Spell.name: Share Language, Communal
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, cleric/oracle 3, druid 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, occultist 3, psychic 2, mesmerist 2
Spell.short_description: As share language, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Shock Shield
Spell.short_description: A shield of force protects you until you dismiss it in an explosion of electricity.

Spell.name: Shocking Image
Spell.short_description: As mirror image, but the duplicates emit electrical damage when destroyed.

Spell.name: Siege Of Trees
Spell.short_description: Transforms Large trees into arboreal catapults of the same size.

Spell.name: Siege of Trees, Greater
Spell.short_description: As siege of trees, but can transform Huge and Gargantuan trees into arboreal catapults of the same size.

Spell.name: Spell Immunity, Communal
Spell.short_description: As spell immunity, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Spell Immunity, Greater Communal
Spell.short_description: As greater spell immunity, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Spider Climb, Communal
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 3, druid 3, sorcerer/wizard 3, summoner/unchained summoner 3, occultist 3, psychic 3
Spell.short_description: As spider climb, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Spontaneous Immolation
Spell.short_description: Target takes 3d6 points of fire damage and catches on fire.

Spell.name: Stabilize Powder
Spell.short_description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm is less likely to misfire.

Spell.name: Stoneskin, Communal
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 5, druid 6, inquisitor 5, sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner 4, psychic 5, unchained summoner 5
Spell.short_description: As stoneskin, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Summoner Conduit
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 4, sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner/unchained summoner 4, witch 5, occultist 4, psychic 5
Spell.short_description: The target takes damage whenever its summoned creature does.

Spell.name: Sun Metal
Spell.short_description: Weapon touched bursts into flames.
Spell.mythic_text: The additional damage dealt by the weapon increases to 1d6 points of fire damage. Any creature struck by the weapon is dazzled for 1 round (no saving throw). On a critical hit, the target is blinded for 1 round (Fortitude negates, DC equal to the DC of the spell).

Spell.name: Symbol Of Striking
Spell.short_description: As symbol of death, but fills a 5-foot square.

Spell.name: Tactical Acumen
Spell.spell_level: bard 2, inquisitor 2, magus 2, paladin 1, sorcerer/wizard 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, medium 2
Spell.area: The caster and all allies within a 30-ft.-radius burst, centered on the caster
Spell.short_description: You gain an additional +1 on attack rolls or to AC due to battlefield positioning.

Spell.name: Tar Pool
Spell.short_description: Converts the top layer of the ground into hot tar.

Spell.name: Targeted Bomb Admixture
Spell.short_description: Empowers bombs you throw to deal more damage to a single creature.

Spell.name: Telekinetic Assembly
Spell.short_description: Assembles a siege engine using 1 fewer worker for every two caster levels.

Spell.name: Telekinetic Charge
Spell.short_description: Launches an ally through the air.

Spell.name: Terrain Bond
Spell.short_description: Treat the terrain you are in as a favored terrain for the spell's duration.

Spell.name: Thunder Fire
Spell.short_description: Ammunition in the targeted firearm deafens opponents.

Spell.name: Tongues, Communal
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 4, bard 3, cleric/oracle 5, sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner/unchained summoner 4, witch 4, psychic 4, mesmerist 3
Spell.short_description: As tongues, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Touch Injection
Spell.short_description: You can deliver an infusion, elixir, poison, or potion as a touch attack.

Spell.name: Twisted Space
Spell.short_description: Targeted creature's attacks target a random square instead of the intended target.

Spell.name: Unerring Weapon
Spell.spell_level: inquisitor 1, magus 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, bloodrager 1, occultist 2, psychic 1, medium 1
Spell.short_description: Grants a +2 bonus, +1 per four caster levels, on attack rolls to confirm a critical hit.

Spell.name: Viper Bomb Admixture
Spell.short_description: Empowers bombs you throw to summon poisonous biting vipers that bite those hit or splashed by the bomb.

Spell.name: Walk Through Space
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 6, magus 6, sorcerer/wizard 7, summoner/unchained summoner 6, witch 7, psychic 7
Spell.short_description: You can spend a move action to teleport 30 feet or to stand while prone without provoking attacks of opportunity.

Spell.name: Warding Weapon
Spell.spell_level: magus 1, sorcerer/wizard 2, summoner/unchained summoner 2, bloodrager 1, occultist 1, psychic 2
Spell.short_description: The weapon you use for the focus of this spell defends you, allowing you to cast spells without provoking attacks of opportunity.

Spell.name: Water Walk, Communal
Spell.short_description: As water walk, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

Spell.name: Weaken Powder
Spell.short_description: Targeted firearm's ammunition halves the firearm's range and imposes a –2 penalty on damage rolls.

Spell.name: Wilderness Soldiers
Spell.short_description: Nearby plants aid you in combat.

Spell.name: Wreath of Blades
Spell.spell_level: magus 4, sorcerer/wizard 5, summoner/unchained summoner 5, witch 5, bloodrager 4, occultist 4, psychic 5
Spell.short_description: Four mithral daggers speed around you, attacking nearby creatures and protecting your spellcasting from attacks of opportunity.

Spell.name: Malediction
Spell.duration: instantaneous/1 minute per HD of the target; see text

Spell.name: Blend
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 1, druid 1, magus 1, ranger 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, witch 1, shaman 1, psychic 1, mesmerist 1

Spell.name: Whispering Lore
Spell.spell_level: cleric/oracle 2, druid 1, ranger 1, witch 1, psychic 1, medium 1

Spell.name: Jitterbugs
Spell.mythic_text: Starting on the second round of the spell, the affected target must succeed at a Fortitude save on your turn or be nauseated for 1 round, as if distracted by an actual swarm.

Spell.name: Minor Dream

Spell.name: Blinding Ray

A target with light blindness, light sensitivity, or any other vulnerability to light is instead blinded for 1d4 rounds on a successful saving throw and permanently blinded on a failed saving throw.

Spell.name: Vomit Twin
Spell.spell_level: alchemist 3, magus 3, sorcerer/wizard 4, summoner/unchained summoner 3, psychic 4
Spell.mythic_text: Any spell you cast that has a range of touch, close, medium, or long can originate from the twin instead of you. The twin gains a deflection bonus to AC equal to your tier, and has hit points equal to double your caster level. The twin can attempt attacks of opportunity using your base attack bonus, but has no ability score modifiers, skills, or feats. It threatens an area appropriate for your size and wields a copy of the weapon you were wielding when you cast mythic vomit twin. If the twin's weapon is destroyed or disarmed, on your turn the twin generates a new weapon from its own substance. Its attacks deal damage using that weapon's die type.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (5th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you create two copies when you cast the spell, and both can be active at the same time. If you instead expend three uses of mythic power, you create three copies when you cast the spell, and all three can be active at the same time.

Spell.name: Firestream
Spell.duration: concentration, up to 1 round/level; see text
Spell.mythic_text: The damage dealt increases to 2d10 points of fire damage. Any creature that fails its saving throw also catches fire (Core Rulebook 444). The continuous line of fire pushes against all creatures, making them treat the spell's area as difficult terrain.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (4th): If you expend two uses of mythic power, you create a second line of fire using your other hand. If you overlap the lines, creatures in the overlap must attempt two saving throws and take the lower result, but don't take damage from both lines. You may stop either line of fire as a free action on your turn, but once you stop maintaining a line, you must cast mythic firestream again to recreate it.

Spell.name: Scorching Ash Form

Spell.augmented: Augmented: If you expend two uses of mythic power, the target can shift into or out of scorching ash form as a move action.

A creature attempting to escape the shadow tether using planar travel or teleportation must succeed at a Will saving throw or be shunted to the Plane of Shadow instead of its intended destination, as if it had cast shadow walk (if the target could not reach the Shadow Plane from its current location using shadow walk, this aspect of the spell has no effect).

Spell.name: Covetous Aura
Spell.mythic_text: The duration of the covetous aura increases to 1 minute perlevel or until discharged. You may gain the benefits of spells of5th level or lower cast within the aura's area of effect. You cangain the effects of two separate spells, after which the mythiccovetous aura ends.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (6th): If you expend two uses of mythicpower, the duration increases to 10 minutes per level or untildischarged. You may gain the benefits of spells of 7th level orlower cast within the aura's area of effect. When you gain thebenefit of a spell, the original spell is immediately targeted witha greater dispel magic spell at your caster level. If the dispelcheck succeeds, the spell ends for any of the original recipientsin the area of your covetous aura.

If you're the focus, the targets retain their mythic tier only while they're within 100 feet of you, and if you die, the spell immediately ends and all targets gain 1d4 permanent negative levels.

Spell.name: Borrowed Time
Spell.mythic_text: If you expend one use of mythic power, instead oftaking an extra swift action, you can take either an extra move oran extra swift action each round. You can use this extra swift actionto take two immediate actions between your turns; this consumesyour extra swift action in your next round. Each extra action youtake still deals damage to you as described above.

Spell.name: Elemental Bombardment
Spell.mythic_text: If you expend one use of mythic power, you cansummon a combination of differently sized elementals of upto two different types, as long as their total number does notexceed the original limit. For example, you could summon oneHuge air elemental and two Large fire elementals, or one Largewater elemental and six Medium earth elementals.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (9th): If you expend three uses of mythic power,you summon twice as many elementals as normal, each withthe advanced simple template.

Spell.name: Imbue With Flight
Spell.mythic_text: If you expend one use of mythic power, you double themaximum weight of the object you can imbue with flight. You canexpend additional uses of mythic power to increase the maximumsize of the object you can imbue with flight. Imbuing a Huge objectrequires two uses of mythic power, imbuing a Gargantuan objectrequires four uses, and imbuing a Colossal object requires eightuses. These costs include the expenditure to cast a mythic spell,and count toward doubling the weight limit of the spell.Two or more casters can cast this spell in concert to share themythic power cost. Each caster must expend an additional use ofmythic power to cooperate; this does not count toward the other costsor effects of the spell. The group chooses which caster has controlof the flight. As a full-round action, the controlling caster can cedecontrol to another caster involved in the original casting of the spell.

Spell.name: Soulreaver
Spell.mythic_text: You can expend one use of mythic power to raisecreatures killed by this effect as undead thralls. You can animatea number of Hit Dice worth of undead up to double your tier as ifyou had animated them with animate dead. The undead createdby this spell count toward the total number of Hit Dice worth ofundead you can control.
Spell.augmented: Augmented (8th): If you expend two uses of mythic power,you can raise slain foes as undead creatures chosen from thelist of undead for create undead. By expending three uses ofmythic power, you can select from the list for create greaterundead. The total number of Hit Dice worth of undead createdin this way can't exceed double your tier. Created undead arenot automatically under your control. If you are capable ofcommanding undead, you may attempt to command the undeadcreatures as they form.

Spell.short_description: Your recall and ability to process information improve.

Spell.short_description: Target gains a message that can be given only to its intended recipient.

Spell.short_description: As create mindscape, but affecting more creatures, having a longer duration, and allowing magic alteration.

Spell.name: Divide Mind

Spell.name: Dream Council
Spell.short_description: Communicate with multiple sleeping creatures.

Spell.name: Dream Scan
Spell.short_description: Read a dreaming creature’s thoughts.

Spell.short_description: As dream travel, but with more flexibility and able to affect more creatures.

Spell.short_description: Deal 6d6 points of damage and entangle creatures in a 30-ft. radius, and push ethereal and incorporeal creatures onto the Material Plane.

Spell.name: Ectoplasmic Snare

Spell.name: Ego Whip II
Spell.short_description: As ego whip I, but a –4 penalty and staggered for 1d4 rounds.

Spell.name: Ego Whip III
Spell.short_description: As ego whip I, but a –6 penalty and staggered for 1d6 rounds.

Spell.name: Ego Whip IV
Spell.short_description: As ego whip I, but a –8 penalty and staggered for 1d8 rounds.

Spell.name: Ego Whip V
Spell.short_description: As ego whip I, but a –10 penalty and staggered for 1d10 rounds.

Spell.name: Erase Impressions

Spell.short_description: As ethereal envelope, but able to affect an unwilling creature.

Spell.name: Ethereal Fists

Spell.name: Etheric Shards

Spell.short_description: Confuse one creature for the duration of your concentration + 1 round.

Spell.name: Id Insinuation II
Spell.short_description: As id insinuation I, but affects two creatures and has a stronger confusion effect.

Spell.name: Id Insinuation III
Spell.short_description: As id insinuation I, but affects three creatures and has a stronger confusion effect.

Spell.name: Id Insinuation IV
Spell.short_description: As id insinuation I, but affects four creatures and you select the confusion effect.

Spell.name: Implant False Reading
Spell.short_description: Instill false psychic impressions into an object.

Spell.name: Incorporeal Chains
Spell.short_description: Grapple incorporeal creatures and deal damage equal to 1d8 + Int.

Spell.name: Inflict Pain
Spell.spell_level: antipaladin 2, inquisitor 2, medium 2, mesmerist 2, occultist 2, psychic 2, sorcerer/wizard 3, spiritualist 2, witch 3
Spell.short_description: Target takes a –4 penalty on attack rolls, skill checks, and ability checks.

Spell.name: Inflict Pain, Mass
Spell.spell_level: antipaladin 4, inquisitor 5, medium 4, mesmerist 5, occultist 5, psychic 6, sorcerer/wizard 7, spiritualist 5, witch 7
Spell.short_description: As inflict pain, but affecting one creature per level.

Spell.name: Instigate Psychic Duel
Spell.short_description: Start a psychic duel between yourself and another creature

Spell.name: Intellect Fortress I
Spell.short_description: Suppress emotion and fear effects in a 20-ft. radius as an immediate action.

Spell.name: Intellect Fortress II
Spell.short_description: As intellect fortress I, plus reduce the damage of mind-affecting effects.

Spell.name: Intellect Fortress III
Spell.short_description: As intellect fortress II, plus remove partial effects of fear and emotion effects.

Spell.name: Mental Barrier I
Spell.short_description: Gain a +4 shield bonus to AC and resist mind thrust for 1 round as an immediate action.

Spell.name: Mental Barrier II
Spell.short_description: As mental barrier I, but +6 to AC.

Spell.name: Mental Barrier III
Spell.short_description: As mental barrier I, but +8 to AC.

Spell.name: Mental Barrier IV
Spell.short_description: As mental barrier III, plus 25% chance to prevent critical hits and sneak attacks.

Spell.name: Mental Barrier V
Spell.short_description: As mental barrier III, plus 50% chance to prevent critical hits and sneak attacks.

Spell.name: Mental Block
Spell.short_description: Prevent the target from using its skill ranks, spells, feats, and abilities.

Spell.name: Microcosm
Spell.short_description: Trap creatures in a veiled mindscape permanently, causing their bodies to waste away in the real world.

Spell.name: Mind Probe
Spell.short_description: Learn answers from a subject’s memories.

Spell.name: Mind Swap
Spell.spell_level: medium 3, mesmerist 5, occultist 4, psychic 5, sorcerer/wizard 6, spiritualist 4, summoner/unchained summoner 5, witch 6
Spell.short_description: Switch minds with another creature for 1 hour per level.

Spell.name: Mind Swap, Major
Spell.short_description: Swap minds with another creature forever.

Spell.name: Mind Thrust I
Spell.short_description: Mentally deal 1d6 points of damage per level.

Spell.name: Mind Thrust II
Spell.short_description: As mind thrust I, but deal 1d8 points of damage per level (maximum 5d8).

Spell.name: Mind Thrust III
Spell.short_description: As mind thrust II, but deal a maximum of 10d8 points of damage.

Spell.name: Mind Thrust IV
Spell.short_description: As mind thrust II, but a maximum of 15d8 points of damage and target is fatigued for 1 round.

Spell.name: Mind Thrust V
Spell.short_description: As mind thrust IV, but target is exhausted or fatigued for 1 round.

Spell.name: Mind Thrust VI
Spell.short_description: As mind thrust IV, but maximum 20d8 points of damage and target is exhausted and stunned for 1 round.

Spell.name: Mindlink
Spell.spell_level: medium 1, mesmerist 1, occultist 1, psychic 1, shaman 1, sorcerer/wizard 1, spiritualist 1
Spell.short_description: Communicate a great deal of information in an instant.

Spell.name: Mindwipe

Spell.short_description: Erase a portion of the target’s mind and experiences, inflicting negative levels.

Spell.short_description: Place a trap on an object to mentally damage a creature that touches it.

Spell.short_description: Project your soul into a creature’s body.

Spell.short_description: Make a creature become bestial and unintelligent.

Spell.short_description: As psychic crush I, but deal 7d6 + 1 points of damage per level on a save and harder to resist.

Spell.short_description: As psychic crush IV, but deal 11d6 + 1 points of damage per level on a save.
